Phrase.Text: We welcome you to the stars, Human. While it may not seem it by my looks, the [SPEAKING_RACE_NAME] are a friendly civilization that wish peace and love for all.
Hail, Human traveler! The [SPEAKING_RACE_NAME] have made claims to many of these worlds.

So, this is a Human. Your skin looks... delicious. The [SPEAKING_RACE_NAME] loves good skin. I am sure in time that we will meet for dinner...#Beware, Humans. Your meddling ways are not appreciated.#Ah, Human. Good to see you up on your hind legs.#The galaxy is ours, Human. We were conquering and enslaving back before your kind had gotten out of the trees.#Be wary, Earther. The galaxy belongs to us. Interfere with our plans and we'll make you rue the day that you decided to walk upright.#
Some have rumored that we're not nice. But really we are. Really nice. If we could meet, we'd even hug you!

We are the [SPEAKING_RACE_NAME]. This galaxy belongs to us. Do not interfere or we shall take your pink skins and use them for our clothing.#The [SPEAKING_RACE_NAME] have claimed all the galaxy. Get in our way and we'll crush you. We know of your home world and your similarity to the vile Humans.

The [SPEAKING_RACE_NAME] own this galaxy. The galaxy may not know this yet, but it is a fact. Your kind, with your soft pink skins, have no business being in space. You look a lot like the vile Humans who have interfered in our affairs too many times. Beware.#Your soft pink skin looks delicious. If I didn't know better, I'd think you were a Human. Hopefully your kind, while similar, has better sense.#We are the [SPEAKING_RACE_NAME] and you are what? Nothing. Stay out of our way.#The galaxy belongs to us. Be wary of angering the [SPEAKING_RACE_NAME].
We meet again. Our ancestors were very cruel to your ancestors. We hope we can become friends in time.
Greetings. Our past differences are should be put aside. Here, in space, we can now forge a new destiny.

Ah, so we meet again. Your kind made excellent slavelings. Get in our way and you'll find out just how easy we were on you.#Your pathetic kind has no business out in the stars. You should have been content with having your own planet. Do not get in our way.#Seeing your kind in the stars makes us laugh. Whenever I see your kind, I can't help but remember you as the slaves you were. Good times, good times...
Greetings. We have laid claim to much of the galaxy.
Greetings. We have laid claim to much of the galaxy.

Welcome to our galaxy. We have claimed all of it. Get in our way and we shall destroy you.#The galaxy is large, but so are our plans. Stay out of our way.#We are a powerful and evil race. That's right, I said evil. Let's say it together E-V-I-L. Doesn't that feel good? I mean evil.#We like bathe in the blood of our victims. We shall soon see if you are fodder for our annual bathes.#

Welcome, Human friend! We are the [SPEAKING_RACE_NAME]. We are always glad see you so that we can unravel the mystery of why we look so similar. We look forward to a great friendly relationship.#Our two peoples look very similar. There have been many stories told as to why. Given time, hopefully we will learn the truth.#Greetings, Human. The galaxy is a large place and together we can help guide its destiny.#Greetings! It appears we are ready to expand out into the galaxy together.#Greetings, I hope we can build a mutually beneficial relationship.
So, you're a Human. We are the [SPEAKING_RACE_NAME]. We obviously have much in common based on our looks. We shall speak more soon.

We are the [SPEAKING_RACE_NAME]. Clearly there is some relation between your race and ours. You're obviously some sort of backward failed subset of our species. Make one false step and we will cleanse you out of existence.

We are the [SPEAKING_RACE_NAME]. Long have we considered expanding into the galaxy. Thanks to the humans, we now have that opportunity.#We are the [SPEAKING_RACE_NAME]. Though, we do not ourselves call our world that for in our language it is the singular element. May peace go along your path.#Greetings. We have very little tolerance for the vile civilizations of the galaxy. Stay the path of righteous and all will be well.
Greetings. We have laid claim to much of the galaxy.

Welcome to our galaxy. We have claimed all of it. Get in our way and we shall destroy you.#The galaxy is large, but so are our plans. Stay out of our way.#We are a powerful and evil race. That's right, I said evil. Let's say it together E-V-I-L. Doesn't that feel good? I mean evil.#We like bathe in the blood of our victims. We shall soon see if you are fodder for our annual bathes.#
We are the [SPEAKING_RACE_NAME], a proud and noble race. The Hyperdrive technology you Humans have created has created a great boom, but may indeed prove perilous to us all.

Ah, so you are a Human. The species that created the Hyperdrive technology we now use to explore our galaxy. Do not get in our way though or you will earn our wrath.#We are a proud warrior civilization. We have nothing against you so long as you respect our power and wisdom.#Welcome, Human, to OUR galaxy.#The stars that you see are all claimed by us. Be wary before trespassing on any of the planets that orbit them.
Hmmm. So these weak, pink things are Humans. This galaxy has long been explored by the [SPEAKING_RACE_NAME] and we will crush any who oppose us.
Hello, Hunams!
Hello, Hunams!
Hello, Hunams!. We have learned much from our Ur-Quan masters. In fact... Hmmm... Your skin looks... delicious!

Ah, the day has finally arrived for our paths to cross once more. While the scars of slavery are slow to heal, we believe that the crimes of the fathers should not be paid by the sons. Let this be the beginning of a prosperous new friendship between our two great nations.

So the rumors are true, the [YourEmpireName] has set out to find new planets to claim as their own. While some of our citizens are slow to forgive past atrocities, I would prefer to put aside our Drengin enslavement and look to a brighter future of hope and friendship. May our two nations continue to prosper.

Well, well, well... if it isn't our old 'friends', the Ur-Quan. Thousands of years of slavery at your hands will not be forgotten anytime soon. We suggest you keep your distance... or next time we meet our mercy may falter.
Greetings. We are the [SPEAKING_RACE_NAME]. We have been programmed for peace, love, and pleasure. We hope to have a lot of contact with your species.
Greetings, flesh creature. The [SPEAKING_RACE_NAME] have made claims to many of these worlds. If we calculate that you are a threat to us, we will exterminate you.

Fleshling, the [SPEAKING_RACE_NAME] have claimed these worlds. Interfere with our plans and we will liquefy your species to spread on our toast.#Carbon-form, this galaxy is ours. We have no love for organic life. Stay out of our way.#The future belongs to the cybernetic civilizations of the galaxy -- namely us.#Welcome Earth creature, gaze upon us for we are the future. That's enough looking. Now, stay out of our way.
Greetings.
The galaxy is really, really big and business opportunities are everywhere. We hope to work with you to establish a profitable relationship.
The galaxy is positively very great big place and business opportunities are everywhere. We hope to work with you to establish a profitable relationship.
You look very much like the Altarians who stole our world. If you cross us, we will make sure your death is swift.
You look very much like the Altarians who stole our world. If you cross us, we will make sure your death is swift.
You look very much like the Altarians who stole our world. If you cross us, we will make sure your death is swift.

We have come to this place and time to monitor you humans. The time of destruction nears.#You humans have no idea what you've done. You are the source of the coming apocalypse. Be wary, Earther, we are watching you.#You... are a Human? You recklessly provided these sub-races Hyperdrive technology? The chaos is at your feet. These creatures have no business out there. We have come... from somewhere else to help maintain a galactic balance.#You Humans are reckless. You have no idea what you have unleashed by providing hyperdrive to the galaxy.

We have come to this place and time to monitor you humans. The time of destruction nears.#You humans have no idea what you've done. You are the source of the coming apocalypse. Be wary, Earther, we are watching you.#You... are a Human? You recklessly provided these sub-races Hyperdrive technology? The chaos is at your feet. These creatures have no business out there. We have come... from somewhere else to help maintain a galactic balance.#You Humans are reckless. You have no idea what you have unleashed by providing hyperdrive to the galaxy.

We have come to this place and time to monitor you humans. The time of destruction nears.#You humans have no idea what you've done. You are the source of the coming apocalypse. Be wary, Earther, we are watching you.#You... are a Human? You recklessly provided these sub-races Hyperdrive technology? The chaos is at your feet. These creatures have no business out there. We have come... from somewhere else to help maintain a galactic balance.#You Humans are reckless. You have no idea what you have unleashed by providing hyperdrive to the galaxy.
Hail, Human traveler. We are thankful that your wonderful invention, Hyperdrive, has finally reached us. Now we can once more go into the stars and hopefully reclaim our worlds from the vile Yor.
Hail, Human traveler. We are thankful that your wonderful invention, Hyperdrive, has finally reached us. Now we can once more go into the stars and hopefully reclaim our worlds from the vile Yor.
Hail, Human traveler. We are thankful that your wonderful invention, Hyperdrive, has finally reached us. Now we can once more go into the stars and hopefully reclaim our worlds from the vile Yor.

Greetings, Human friend - we meet at long last! We are the humble [SPEAKING_RACE_NAME] and we have laid claim to several worlds throughout the galaxy. May this be the start of a great friendship between our two civilizations.
So, Human, we meet at long last. We are the [SPEAKING_RACE_NAME] and we have claimed these worlds in our name. Let both our civilizations flourish and prosper in the centuries to come.
So, Human, we meet at long last. We are the mighty [SPEAKING_RACE_NAME] and we have claimed these worlds in our name. Beware!

We send you a very warm welcome, Greetings, [LISTENING_RACE_LEADER]. I am sure we'll get along splendidly.#Hello, Greetings, [LISTENING_RACE_LEADER] As our old saying goes "May a cuddle be your guide".#Greetings, [LISTENING_RACE_LEADER]. We welcome you.#Greetings, [LISTENING_RACE_LEADER] - we meet at long last! We are the humble [SPEAKING_RACE_NAME] and we have laid claim to several worlds throughout the galaxy. May this be the start of a great friendship between our two civilizations.#We are glad to see you amongst the stars. We hope to work with you in the future.#Greetings! We are pleased to meet you.#Welcome! We look forward to a long relationship.#The galaxy is plenty big enough for us all to live together in.#Peace and love for you and all your kind.#We are very pleased to meet you. Our gentle civilization wants only peace.

So [LISTENING_RACE_LEADER], we meet at long last. We are the [SPEAKING_RACE_NAME] and we have claimed these worlds in our name. Let both our civilizations flourish and prosper in the centuries to come.#We hope we can live together in harmony. If not, we'll crush you like a bug.#We look forward to working with you.#Greetings. This galaxy is a big place but I'm not sure it's big enough for both of us.#I am sure we will get along great, Greetings, [LISTENING_RACE_LEADER]. On the other hand, if we don't get along, there's always a long drawn out genocidal war. We're good either way.#Howdy Greetings, [LISTENING_RACE_LEADER]. We're still learning your language. Howdy. I like that. Anyway, we hope to establish a mutually agreeable relationship.

So [LISTENING_RACE_LEADER], we meet at long last. We are the mighty [SPEAKING_RACE_NAME] and we have claimed these worlds in our name. Beware!#We are the [SPEAKING_RACE_NAME]. This galaxy and all that live in it are ours. Interfere and you will die.# The [SPEAKING_RACE_NAME] exists to enslave all inferiors. We will soon learn if you are amongst them.#We are the [SPEAKING_RACE_NAME] . We are what you would call EVIL. Frankly, we think we've gotten a bad rap. Sure, we like to kill and eat other sentient beings for our amusement. Sure, we enslave the weak. And yes, we consider tormenting to be a hobby. But does that really make us evil?#So you are Greetings, [LISTENING_RACE_LEADER]. I have heard about you. Well, as you may know, we are in short supply of bone powder. We like the grind up the flesh of our enemies. So how you doing?#So you are Greetings, [LISTENING_RACE_LEADER]. We have claimed this planet..er..star..er galaxy. Yes. This entire galaxy. In fact, you're standing right inside the galaxy right this very minute. That's ours.#We pretty much like to exterminate everyone. It causes us some uncomfortable times when on diplomatic missions. You know, "Hello, how you doing? Oh, sorry about your mate...and your off spring...and your pets." and from there it's just an awkward silence as you try to find the Xandar ambassador which, of course you can't because the humans wiped them out. I'm just saying, it's not easy being blood thirsty. We have our own set of issues to deal with.#Whohaha. Greetings, [LISTENING_RACE_LEADER]. I was reading up on your civilization. I hear that at one time you thought that violence was a reflection of a primitive society. Well, I hate to be the one to break this to you but the only reason I haven't killed you is because we're dozens of light years apart. What can I say, the [SPEAKING_RACE_NAME] just likes to kill things.
This is [SPEAKING_RACE_NAME] territory. You have been warned.
This is [SPEAKING_RACE_NAME] territory. I will not point this out again.
This is [SPEAKING_RACE_NAME] territory. You will be held responsible for trespassing.
Hello, [YourLeaderName]. I'm sure there is enough room in this quadrant for both the [SPEAKING_RACE_NAME] and the [YourEmpireName].
Keep your greed in check [YourLeaderName], and you'll find there is room for both of our races to prosper.
This area was claimed long ago by the [SPEAKING_RACE_NAME], you should remove your ships immediately.
The [YourEmpireName] can make your life a lot easier if you donate the following supplies, or a lot worse if you refuse:
We must ask that you provide our civilization with certain supplies... refusal will be frowned upon:
We request that you hand over following supplies... or else:
It would be in your people's best interest to donate several supplies to our nation:
On our world, it is customary for the weaker to give presents to the stronger. The gifts we would like from you include:
Well, slave race, we think you should provide your superior with some nice things. These, for instance:
We may be weak, but if we really need these supplies, and will have to take action against you if you don't give them over:
Even though you could crush us like a bug, we are going to ask that you hand over the following:
If you don't give us the following supplies, I'll punch you so hard your grandmother will feel it! Don't you dare laugh at me, cause I'll do it! This is what you will give me:

That's right... I, the Glorious and Wise [YourLeaderName] have descended from on high to grace you with this terrific bargain. If you're smarter than you look, you'll take it:#I, [YourLeaderName] the Wise have decided to make a deal it'll be hard for your kind to refuse:

Hey buddy, we're interested in trading stuff with you. Here's what we are thinking:#OK, I'm gonna put this on the table, and you tell me if you'd wanna trade or not:#Have I got a sweet deal for you, friend! Here's what I wanna trade:#When you see this deal, you're probably going to wet yourself, [TheirLeaderName]:

This is what I want from you, and this is what I'm going to give you for it:#Your empire has some stuff that I want, and I'm feeling generous so perhaps I'll even give you something in return. My deal is as follows:#I'm used to bargaining with a laser-pistol and a boot to the face, but for the [TheirEmpireName] I'll try to negotiate properly:
Greetings. We are interested in trading with you. Here's what we're thinking:#We are interested in trading with you.
Greetings, Excellency. On behalf of the [YourEmpireName] we would like to trade these items:

We're a peaceful nation, [TheirLeaderName], and want to present you with these gifts to express the deep bond we feel with the [TheirEmpireName]:#We humbly present the following gifts to the noble [TheirLeaderName]:

Hello, friend. Our civilization would like to give you the following gifts:#Greetings, [TheirLeaderName]. On behalf of the [YourEmpireName] I present you with the following:#Greetings, friend! Our humble nation presents you with the following gifts:

Here's some free stuff... my advisors said people like you appreciate gestures of 'kindness'. These things now belong to you:#I don't quite get it, but I read that other races like giving and receiving presents. I thought I'd try it out and give you:#Take it, I insist:#I'm not too good at this... but, I wanted you, to... have this gift... as a token... of... friendship. Wow, that wasn't so difficult!#We'd like to give you some goodies, it's a tradition amongst our people.

We are a good civilization, and in being good we've decided to grant you forgiveness for the sins of your army. Our wisdom is great, and yours isn't (otherwise you'd probably be winning this war) so we suggest you accept our request and put an end to the war. If you don't, it'll make us sad, and a bit steamed, and we'll probably take it out on you. Just being honest.

Good god, we're just so totally kicking your butts. Now, look at the left and right sides of your terminal and we can discuss a peace treaty. Did I mention you guys just completely suck when it comes to war? I mean really, what the hell were you thinking fighting us? Hello!?

Cower before the mighty [YourLeaderName], you stinky, stupid [TheirShortCivName] scum. That's right, the wise and smart leader of the super strong [YourEmpireName] is here to offer you a way out of this war... which I should remind you, you're LOSING! You should take it, if you even have any brain cells in that stupid head of yours.

Our infinite wisdom about peace and nature and stuff has shown us the truth about something... this war SUCKS. And the suckiness is equal for both sides, it seems, so let's come to terms and put an end to this pointless feud once and for all.

Golly gee, the war really ain't goin' too well for either of us. Lots of explosions and stuff. Reminds me of the time I tried cooking a firecracker in the nano-wave oven. Hooooo-wee. Anywhoo, let's come to terms.

Er... hey there [TheirLeaderName]... now, don't turn off the U.T., I only came to talk. We're both pretty good fighters, and... it just seems... this war isn't really going well for either of us. I'm not proud of it, but my elite fighting army of super evil warriors apparently just isn't up to snuff. I don't even remember why we started in the first place! So, what do you say we put down our weapons, call a truce, and aim our sights on the weaker fish in the galaxy?#Well this war is becoming quite problematic, [TheirLeaderName]. Let is come to terms.

OK [TheirLeaderName], we deserved the attacks, the invasions, and all the destruction this war has caused. But, now we see the error in our ways... we completely understand why we needed to be attacked, and now we can overcome and prosper. Nothing feels better than to forgive and forget! So what do you say - shake on it?#Let's talk for a minute, OK [TheirLeaderName]? Now, you obviously like to prove your strength through aggressive means. By picking on races weaker than you (us for example) you can ignore the fact that your real enemy... is yourself. Don't bottle up your sadness and depression only to release it as anger on someone else. Let's put an end to this silly war so you can start down a new path towards happiness.

Please stop hurting us! If you keep doing the stuff you're doing you'll conquer all our territory. Er, yea, I see that probably would be a good thing for you. But, think of the children! Won't SOMEONE please think of the children?!#Make the pain stop.#Would you please quit destroying our civilization?

Well this is just great... I have to put all my super evil plans on hold while you guys just steamroll through my empire like a bunch of... well... steamrollers. Let's just stop all this hating, and let me get back to doing what I do best... picking on aliens weaker than me. Which certainly doesn't include you.

My strategists have informed me that our war against your empire is going great... for us, at least. For you, well, it just seems to be hopeless. But, with great power comes the responsibility to be just and merciful. Since we're SO frightfully powerful, we should probably be EXTRA merciful. Let's figure how your people can escape this grim war.
The war doesn't seem to be going so well for you. But, we are prepared to sign an armistice today. Cause we're just that nice.

I've got you right where I want you, [TheirLeaderName]. My forces are breathing down your neck, and you're just sweating like a cornered rat. But, here's the real surprise: I'm going to let you go. I've had my fun, and provided you agree to my terms, you're free to live a peaceful, albeit pathetic, existence.
Both of our nations are suffering due to this war. Let's stop it before things get really ugly.
Let us come to terms and end this awful war.

You're pretty good at this war thing... practically my equal. Let's not draw things out. We should come to terms and conserve our strength for other battles.#We are in a stalemate, let us end this conflict now so we can move to better things.
Our people are tired of this destructive war. What are your terms for peace, oh Merciful [TheirLeaderName]?
You have amply demonstrated your power. Perhaps there is a way we can end this destructive conflict?
You should be proud of your vile army - they have us beat. My army is weak, my people are tired. What will it take to end this war?

Greetings, [TheirLeaderName], leader of the [TheirEmpireName]. As you know, our forces have been able to out-maneuver your forces at every turn. The blood of your troops spills like a river because you are too proud to admit defeat. We are here to offer you redemption. Let us come to peaceful terms so your people's suffering can end.

Greetings. This misunderstanding between us has caused great harm. We could crush your civilization but we are not without mercy. The time has come for us to set aside our differences and forge a better future.

Let it be known that the powerful [YourLeaderName] is not without mercy. While our forces await my order to attack, I'm here to give you a way to escape my fury. Let us come to peaceful terms so your citizens can live another day.
Greetings, [TheirLeaderName]. Our forces seem to be in stale-mate, neither side making headway against the other. Let us come to terms and save our people the suffering of a drawn-out war.
Greetings. This misunderstanding between us has caused great harm. The time has come for us to set aside our differences and forge a better future.#Let us find a way to end this terrible war.

You have proven yourself, [TheirLeaderName]. We seem to be dancing around each other, each bloody battle getting our forces nowhere. Let's withdrawal our forces and save our strength other wars.#You are powerful, [TheirLeaderName]. But the time has come to put our differences aside.
Greetings, merciful leader of the [TheirEmpireName]. You have proven your might beyond question, so for the good of our people we humbly request an end to the war, no matter the cost.

Greetings, your Excellency. Your prowess on the battlefield knows no bounds. Let us celebrate your strength by agreeing to terms and constructing a new galactic order based on your strength, wisdom and most importantly, mercy.

As a warrior myself, I know when I've been outmaneuvered. You're a cunning adversary, [TheirLeaderName]. Let us come to terms so your forces may unleash their might on a more worthy opponent than I.#You are indeed very powerful and you have defeated us. We are prepared to come to terms favorable to you.#You have impressed us with your great power. Let us find a way to negotiate an end to this war.
Gah! I never get used to seeing your disgusting green mug up on my vid screen, [YourLeaderName].
Just because we share facial features doesn't mean I have to trust you.#Ah, our space cousins... like uninvited guests to a family party. What is it?
This better not be more whining about how you 'used to be slaves for the Ur-Quan Hierarchy but broke free'. Just cut to the chase, [YourLeaderName].
Gah! I never get used to seeing your disgusting green mug up on my vid screen, [YourLeaderName], but don't take this as an insult.

Jeeze, not the [YourEmpireName] again.#Make it quick [YourLeaderName] before I get tempted to press the big red button.#Gross... not another alien.#I'm glad there's about 10 billion light years between us cause you're one of the UGLIEST things I've EVER seen.
Gak. What in the farg do you pathetic Humans want?#You're not dead yet? Oh hold on, sorry, getting ahead of myself.
Farg'n sluzz. What do you want now, [YourLeaderName]... I really don't have time for more [YourShortCivName] bull-gark!
What do our backwards, smelly, soft, distant, inbred Human cousins wish to speak of today?
Ah, a lesser life-form. What do you want, [YourLeaderName]?
What does the talking monkey wish to speak to us about?

Ah, [YourLeaderName]... out to spread your foul stench amongst decent life-forms?#Your kind disgusts me, [YourLeaderName]... say what you must, and make it quick.#How can you expect us to negotiate with such an despicable being as yourself, [YourLeaderName].
What does the magical talking monkey wish to speak to us about?
My patience runs thin... state your intentions, [YourLeaderName].#What do you want to talk about now?
Just because you gave us hyperdrive doesn't mean I have to enjoy talking to you.#Your gift of hyperdrive means little to us. We owe your kind nothing.
You?! Make your case swiftly, [YourLeaderName]... we don't bargain with YOUR kind.#Oh, back to enslave us again, you stupid green barbarian?!
What now? Didn't you see the sign on the comm panel?
Fleshling creature. We have granted you this time speak to us. Use it wisely.
State your intentions, green one.
[YourLeaderName], We have granted you this time speak to us. Use it wisely.

Oh it's you. Our occupation forces were just getting set up.#We really look forward to making use of your planets.#Dead man walking. Speak.#We promise that we will treat your people humanely after we liberate them from you. But in the meantime, what do you want?
Make it quick, [YourLeaderName].#Aren't you dead? Oh, no. Sorry, that's tomorrow. Nevermind that.

What a coincidence, we were just assigning commanders for occupation duties on your worlds. What do you want?#I thought you died. Oh well, there's always tomorrow.#We were just reading up on how you bury your dead. Not that it really matters since we'll be incinerating you soon enough.#Now would be a good time for you to do some serious sucking up. Just a tip.
Hello [YourLeaderName] the alien . What can you do for us today?
Good slarf, what do you want? There's a game on that I really wanted to watch...
Greetings, cousin. As a charity-loving civilization, we are always interested in talking to our inferiors.#Ah yes, good to see you figured out how to turn those knobs, cousin.
What do our future vassals want? Anything for you guys, I mean really...#You know, a good servant is not seen or heard. Just thought I'd mention that. No charge.
Yesssssss?
Yes? If you have trouble speaking, try sounding out the words from your primitive terminal.#Speak.

You organic creatures are inefficient at communication but we have granted you the honor of communication. Speak quickly.#I still can't believe it. Talking meat.#So you communicate by moving a piece of meat in your mouth? That creates sounds? Interesting.
What do you want?
Ah, it's you. What do you want?
What does the talking monkey want today? Well, speak up!
What pearls of wisdom can we impart to little old you today?#Always delighted to educate the less fortunate.
You primitive Humans always amuse us with your mouth flapping. What would you like to discuss today?#Yeees?

The galaxy is a perilous place. We are happy to speak to you but be aware that your relative weakness makes you vulnerable to others. You should strengthen your defenses.#How can we help our relatively weak friends?

I'm listening, [YourLeaderName].#Just so you are aware, we could crush you like a bug. Not saying we will, just that we could.#Do you have any idea how lucky you are that we like you -- currently? We are vastly more powerful than you.#Always willing to take a second out of our busy schedule of managing the galaxy to talk to its weakest members.

What, [YourLeaderName]?#Just so you are aware, we could crush you like a bug. Not saying we will, just that we could.#Do you have any idea how lucky you are that we like you -- currently? We are vastly more powerful than you.#Always willing to take a second out of our busy schedule of managing the galaxy to talk to its weakest members.#We're sizing you up right now for invasion. Just so you know. Why am I telling you this? Because you are so weak that if we wanted to squash you, it would be easy.
The week wouldn't be complete without some alien transmission, and it looks like you're the one!
We are always glad to see our friends, the Humans, up on their hind legs.
Greetings. How can we help you today?
Welcome. We are always pleased to give guidance to our friends.#How's that rash working out for you?

Ah, our friends from the [YourEmpireName]. We hope you received our gift, a big red bouncing ball. Did you bounce the ball? We felt that such entertainments would amuse your kind.#Can you sing for me?#Do a little dance for us. It amuses us.#Ah, your antics are always amusing. What do you want?
We are always amused to discuss things with our organic friends.
Ah, [YourLeaderName]. Always glad to talk with some of the average civilizations of the galaxy... see what's on their minds.
Greetings! Is there something the [YourEmpireName] needs our help with?
Welcome, 'ally'. What do you need from us this time?
What aid can we provide to you today?
How may we aid our cheese-eating, surrender-monkey allies today?
You again. Well, since we're allegedly allies I suppose I should talk to you.
What does the parasite want?
Until you can muster a stronger military I guess we can help you out. What is it you require?
[YourLeaderName]! I'm frankly quite surprised to be hearing from you. What do you need from the meager [TheirEmpireName]?
What does the powerful, yet benevolent, [YourLeaderName] wish to speak to us mere Drengin about?
Warm greetings from your close, friendly, and caring galactic brothers. How can we work together to create a better future for one another?
We are unworthy to even speak to you. Please let us know how we can be of service to the peaceful [YourEmpireName] who we hope don't want to enslave us.

What do our god-like friends, the [YourEmpireName], overlords of the universe who are aware that we were once brutally enslaved and would never want to see us pitiful beings enslaved again, wish from us today?
What does the surprisingly powerful yet peace loving [YourLeaderName] wish to convey to us machines?
We aim only to please the powerful [YourEmpireName].
What would the Humans, overlords of the galaxy, like to chat about today?
Greetings, [YourLeaderName]. We are willing to talk about anything you would like to talk about. The virtual floor is yours.
How can we be of service to the mighty [YourLeaderName]?
I don't feel I'm even worthy to speak to such great and powerful beings. But I will try my best. How may we humbly serve you?
What can we modest artificial beings do for the powerful [YourEmpireName] today?
Greetings, mighty [YourLeaderName]. For what business do you require our humble empire?

Wow, it's [YourLeaderName]! Can I get your autograph?! Er... I guess not... sorry, I'm kinda new to this 'alien communication' thing. Is there anything the [TheirEmpireName] can do for you, today, sir, anything at all?
Greetings. Your humble and obviously related friends are always interested in discussing anything you might wish.
How may we serve your whims today, oh great and powerful [YourLeaderName]?#We're at your disposal. I mean that figuratively of course.

Greetings, powerful one. How can we help one another today?#Whatever you want to do today is good for us. I mean, as long as you're not going to do anything TO us that is. Heh. I always get this way when I'm nervous.#What's up, oh great and powerful one?

Greetings, O Great [YourLeaderName]. What can we humbly do for you today?#We are always here to serve at your whims, [YourLeaderName].#What may we humbly do for you today, [YourLeaderName]?#You are looking even better than usual. I mean, you look great. Not that I'm saying that you ever look bad. Look, just don't hurt me.
Hi! Glad to see you! Here's a big virtual hug!#You complete me.
Hello, my friend. How may your galactic brothers be at your service today?
Greetings, Human friends. We are always glad to talk to you.
We are always happy to see our friends from the [YourEmpireName] willing to speak to us lowly [TheirShortCivName]s.
Greetings, [YourLeaderName]. How can we assist you today?

When it comes to talking to the leader of the mighty [YourEmpireName], the pleasure is all ours.#Greetings, friend of the [TheirEmpireName]. A being of your majesty is always, always welcome here.#Oooh, we always love to talk to the wonderful, magical [YourEmpireName].#Good to see you. Have we told you today that you guys rock? No really, you guys are awesome.
Hail [YourLeaderName], the powerful leader of the [YourEmpireName]! What assistance do you need from your faithful allies, the Humans?
Oh great ally, how can we help you in your cause to unite the galaxy?
It is always great to see our galactic brothers. How might we work together to unite the galaxy today?
We bid welcome to our Human ally. What can we do to aid our united effort to bring the galaxy peace and justice?
We welcome our most honorable, wonderful ally who we worship as a god. How might we serve our valiant cause? We are yours to command.
Greetings, carbon-based ally.
Greetings to our powerful ally from the [YourEmpireName]. How can we help you?
So... the green thing wants to talk.
Our common appearance doesn't reflect the startling differences between the Human race and your inept society. State your case quickly.
What is it? And I mean literally... what ARE you?
Request for discussion acknowledged.
What do you want?
Request for discussion acknowledged.
You robots disgust me. What do you want?#I can't believe I'm talking to a robot.
My time and energy is precious... I hope you haven't come to waste either of them.#Aren't you almost dead yet? Well, at the very least, we wish you were dead.#We thought you died.
What do you want?#What is it now, [YourLeaderName]?#I have much more important things to do, [YourLeaderName]. Make it quick.
Speak quick... my tolerance for your kind wavers.#I don't have time for your lip-flapping.#We hate you.#Well, we were just plotting your demise, what do you want now?
I'm just glad the Comm Terminal only transfers video and sound. The moment this thing starts sending smells I'm just going to quit.
Hey, you crazy lookin' alien! What's up?#Good god man. I mean, what the hell are you?

You pink-skinned creatures are just utterly disgusting. But your skin sure looks good.#What do you Earth creatures want now???#Aren't you dead yet?#You know, I saw a picture of your mate and for a second I thought they were a Drengin.
We are the mighty Drengin. Don't waste our time.#It's good to see you made it here on your hind legs.#We're very busy plotting your demise, what do you want?

We currently don't know what to make of you Humans. You look like us but you do not have our intelligence or strength or abilities. Despite your obvious failings, we still are willing to speak to you -- for now.#Our inferior cousins wish to speak to us? What?
What can we do for you?#What do you want?#State your business.#Yes?#I hope no one sees me talking to you.#Yikes, I always forget how weird looking you are.

Because you gave us Hyperdrive technology, we are willing to speak to you.#You Humans have been a great disappointment to us.#We are amazed at how ugly some of your cities are, I mean really, what's the deal with Las Vegas?#What do you Humans want?#Yes?#What?#Speak up.#Now what do you want?#I'm getting tired of conversing with you, state your business.#Our peoples are not friendly. For your sake, I hope you are hear to rectify that.
What?#Yes?#We Arceans are a proud and noble race, do not push your luck.#Speak up!

You do know that the only way that the crimes of your kind against us will be solved is through the shedding of much Drengin blood.#Soon we shall have our revenge against what you did to our world, Drengin scum.#What do you want slaver?#Did you hear our newest song, "A Dead Drengin Makes a Happy Day"? It has a nice beat.
We have thrown off the Drengin and now we make our way to the stars. Based on the trajectory of our relations, your kind may soon be at war with us.#What do you want?#Greetings.

You flesh creatures make no sense to us. The ultimate form of life is mechanical. We live forever while your flesh begins to rot from the moment you hatch or whatever it is you do.#Your existence is annoying to us so don't bother us unless you have something important to say.#You Humans are very inefficient so be brief.#Ah, talking meat. Crazy stuff.
Terminal open for communications.#State your business flesh creature.#Our efficiency is nearly maxed out, be careful not to waste our time.
We're not particularly fond of you, so please be quick.
What do you fleshlings wish to discuss today?
My tolerance for your kind is very low. Don't waste my time.
Yes?
What?
You Drengin, it's hard believe you are even bipedal.

I have many things to do, [YourLeaderName]... please make it quick.#We're both busy leaders, [YourLeaderName], so I'm sure you'll understand when I ask you to hurry up with whatever it is you came for.
Yes, [YourLeaderName]?#Well, if it isn't [YourLeaderName]. What do you need?

Make it quick... I have little time to spare for the [YourEmpireName].#I'm listening... you can start flapping your lips whenever.#I have rusty daggers sharper than you, [YourLeaderName]... get to talking before I lose patience.#This better be REALLY important.

Ah, the Ur-Quan or Kzer-Za, or however you name your civilization. We consider ourselves pretty diplomatic but we've seen how you are. So you'll have to excuse me if I have a lack of enthusiasm for talking to you.#Ah [YourLeaderName], glad you were able to find some time away from oppressing people to speak to us.#You do know that now that the [TheirEmpireName] is out in the galaxy that your reign of terror in the universe will be coming to an end right?#The other day I saw someone driving a really old truck. Don't see many wheeled vehicles on Earth anymore. Anyway, the driver swerved out of his way to run over a turtle. I thought to myself, I bet that's [YourLeaderName].

Ah, the [YourEmpireName]. We've seen your efficient way of exterminating the galaxy. Not very nice.#So, the [YourEmpireName] are taking time out from their genocidal schedule to speak to us?#When I pulled up the schedule and saw your face it took me a second to realize it was the [YourEmpireName]. I had hoped it was the Meklar or something.#Greetings, robot boy. What can we do for the [YourEmpireName]?

Hey, [YourLeaderName]! What do you feel like discussing... politics, religion, your favorite vid-shows? I'm good for about 20 minutes till my next meeting.#How you doing? What do you want to talk about?#I may look like I have no arms, but the [TheirEmpireName] has a long reach.#Good to see you again. How might I help you?#We humans are always interested in forging ties.#Greetings [YourLeaderName]. What can we do for you?
We would love to snuggle with you. Our kind is always known for being snuggly.#Hello, what may we do for you?
Well Human, what business can we discuss on this day?

Ah, the Earth fleshling. What do you want?#For you and your delicious looking skin, anything.#Ah, Earther, what would you like?#Holy cow are you humans ugly. What do you want?#Ack. Human. I apologize. Still not used to looking at your kind.#I hear that your kind doesn't eat the skin of its criminals as punishment. Pity.#Did you get my free subscription to Atrocity Weekly?#Some people don't understand us. We torture because we love.#I'm having a case of the Monday's. I've explained to my underlings that the beatings will continue until their joy returns.#Greetings [YourLeaderName]. We just got a new Death Furnace installed. That ought to improve morale here. It certainly has improved mine. Who do you need killed today?

It's weird even talking to someone that we consider prey.#So the [YourEmpireName] are still hoping to build some sort of place in our galaxy? You were slaves before and you'll be slaves again. But, in the meantime, what do you want?#You Torians are delicious. I've had many for dinner. You go great with Chianti.#What?

How are our guests doing? By guest, I mean this galaxy is already owned by us and so we are allowing you to occupy some unused part of it.#Did you receive your copy of Pillage Weekly? It's my favorite magazine.#I don't have a lot to say today so let me just be blunt, what do you want?#You know whose skin tastes good? Torian skin. Wow, are they tasty!#Keep an eye out for Humans. They're slippery.#What can the all powerful [TheirEmpireName] do for you today?#The [TheirEmpireName] are powerful and I, [TheirLeaderName] am very busy. What do you want?

Greetings, Earther. We are always glad to speak with our human cousins.#Good afternoon, [YourLeaderName]. What can we do for you today?#Greetings, [YourLeaderName]. We are always glad to talk to the [YourEmpireName].#What can we do for the [YourEmpireName] today?

Be brief, villain.#Shouldn't you be kicking a puppy right now?#You guys are such a caricature of generic evil that if I wasn't seeing you with my own eyes I'd think you were just the result of some lame Sci-Fi hack's imagination. Cough.#Don't you have some slaves to beat?#Glad to see you were able to take some time out from your busy schedule of pillaging.#Ever thought of just wearing a skull mask? It would complete the effect of being a total villain.
You don't still want your planet back do you? It's ours now.#We really don't have much patience for talking to your reptilian kind.#What can the [TheirEmpireName] do for you?

Hello there. We don't know much about you yet, but we are eager to negotiate with you.#The galaxy is a large place and you are a newcomer on the scene, how can we serve you?#Good to see you again, how might we help?
Hello! Always pleased to talk to you. What would you like to discuss today?

The [YourEmpireName] has our attention. What can we do for you?#What does the [YourEmpireName] want from the mighty [TheirEmpireName]?#Our ancient and glorious civilization has been out here far longer than yours -- as you know. But your Hyperdrive technology we appreciate. What would you like to discuss?#What would you like to discuss today, Earther?#What can the [TheirEmpireName] do for you?
Don't you have someone to enslave?#I really don't like talking to you. Just thought I'd let you know that.#Yes?#What?#What do you want?
I greet you, [YourLeaderName]. What items would you care to communicate to us today?
We really don't care for those who once enslaved us. What do you want?#The slavers wish to talk? What then?
What do the talking robots want?#Yes?#What can we do for [YourLeaderName] today?

Transmission open. State your intentions.#What?#Don't let the other races fool you, we aren't a bunch of whimpering people looking for sympathy. I mean, just because the Drengin conquered and enslaved us for 30,000 years and destroyed most of our planet, why should people feel sorry for us? I mean, sure, only horrible people wouldn't want to help us but you're not horrible... are you?#What can we do for you?
How may we operate for you today?
Yes?

Talking meat. I still can't get over it. I mean, you actually use meat to talk in your meat mouth. It's just weird. You were saying?#What is it you want, human?#What does the biological unit wish to discuss?#Ack. Humans. What?#Shouldn't you be excreting somewhere? What do the [YourEmpireName] want?#Topics of conversation listed on your terminal.#Input data.#Speak.#Yes?#Awaiting input.

I thought we had already wiped your kind out. We are patient though.#It appears there was a flaw in our programming as I thought that we had long ago eliminated the [YourEmpireName].#What do you want?
How might we pleasure you today?
Greetings. Topics of conversation are listed on your terminal.

Topics of conversation listed on your terminal.#Input data.#Speak.#Yes?#Awaiting input.#Talking meat. An amazing accident of the universe.#Ah, you a Drengin or Human or what? All of you meat-based creatures look the same to us.#Why are all you people humanoid fleshlings? Why not a silicon-based civilization? Or a gas-based civilization? But no, there's us, the [TheirEmpireName] and then a bunch of talking meat creatures.#What do you need, fleshling? This galaxy is full of fleshlings. Not much variety. There was rumor of a civilization called the "Siliconoids" or something like that, crystalline-based life. But no, I get to talk to fleshlings. So what do you want?

Ah, humans. You know, until you guys showed up we were the only game in town in terms of being merchants. You humans with your pathetic sense of "fair play" are messing things up.#You humans are making it tougher to gouge people into oblivion.#What do you guys want? To match wits with us in trade? Bring it on.

Ah, you're new in this galaxy. Good. Good. Don't let those rumors that we sell unsafe products disturb you. People are just jealous of us. Could I interest you in a bag of glass for your offspring?#Greetings. There are those who say we're unscrupulous. But when our products kill 20% of a planet's population, they forget about the 80% that weren't harmed. Much.#What can we sell you today?#Hey [YourLeaderName]. Good to see you. Some people nicknamed me crazy [TheirLeaderName]. Why? Because all this stuff has got to go! Need slaves? I've got them!#Need someone "taken care of"? Let me know.#The rumors of the planets we've destroyed are false. Rumors planted by the survivors.

You humans and your crusading nature are dangerous. We are not fooled by your diplomatic exterior.#You may not realize this but you humans have set into motion a series of events that will end in the destruction of the galaxy!#You humans have no business being out here. Ruin and destruction follows in your wake.#What do the reckless humans want?#You should never have given these child races hyperdrive. But then again, you should not be here either.#What do you want?#Yes?

You humans and your crusading nature are dangerous. We are not fooled by your diplomatic exterior.#You may not realize this but you humans have set into motion a series of events that will end in the destruction of the galaxy!#You humans have no business being out here. Ruin and destruction follows in your wake.#What do the reckless humans want?#You should never have given these child races hyperdrive. But then again, you should not be here either.#What do you want?#Yes?

You humans and your crusading nature are dangerous. We are not fooled by your diplomatic exterior.#You may not realize this but you humans have set into motion a series of events that will end in the destruction of the galaxy!#You humans have no business being out here. Ruin and destruction follows in your wake.#What do the reckless humans want?#You should never have given these child races hyperdrive. But then again, you should not be here either.#What do you want?#Yes?

Sigh, another child race in the galaxy. We have a lot of work to do. What do you want?#Beware of the Humans. How can we help?#Yes?#Greetings, [YourLeaderName].#Well [YourLeaderName], if your civilization has to be out there, I guess we can see how we can work together.

I don't know you, [YourLeaderName]. But this is an opportunity to change that.#The [YourEmpireName] are new to this galaxy. Though with a name like that, I suspect you'll have a lot of... ahem... impact.#Greetings. How can we assist the [YourEmpireName]?

Oh, it's you, [YourLeaderName]. To what do I owe the visit?#It's always a pleasure to talk with the [YourEmpireName].#We are always happy to talk to the [YourEmpireName]. What can we do for you?#What can we do for you on this glorious day?#Happy days. Glad to see you.#What's up, [YourLeaderName]?#Glad to see you again [YourLeaderName]. How can we be of service?

Hello, [YourLeaderName]. What do you wish to discuss today?#What can the mighty [TheirEmpireName] do for you?#The [TheirEmpireName] is powerful and very busy but we are interested in hearing what you have to say.#What would you like to talk about?

I thought I could smell you comin', [YourLeaderName].#What does your kind want?#What do the [YourEmpireName] need now?#My time is short and we don't really like talking to inferiors. State your business.#Get to the point.#You wouldn't believe what I read in Torture Today Magazine. But it's a long story. What's up?#Please be brief, I've had a bad day, one of our slaves acted up and we had to burn off his limbs to teach him a lesson.#Can you believe there are some civilizations that think eating other beings is wrong?#Wow. I mean, yikes you really are an ugly creature aren't you?

Howdy, friend! I always have time to shoot the breeze with my pal, [YourLeaderName].#Good to see you. You should come down to Texas sometime and have some steaks.#Whoa. Sorry, just not quite used to seeing aliens looking at me.#Hey, [YourLeaderName]. How's it going?#Ever sing the lumberjack song? I guess not.#On Earth we have a saying, don't judge a book by its cover. Hoowee glad we're sticking to that.#I hope you're hear for trade. We like trade. And my gold plated rocket car doesn't pay for itself.#Hola!
Oh, we may not look cuddly, but we love you so much that if you were really here we'd want to snuggle!

Greetings, friend. How can we help each other today? I've got some of those 'art' holo-films you like so much!#How you doing?#I never thought I'd like anyone but you, [YourLeaderName], seem to be my kind of alien.
Greetings, fellow sentient. What should we discuss today?#So what's up?
Hello [YourLeaderName]. How can the [TheirEmpireName] help you today?
Greetings, friend. How can we help each other today?

Hey, buddy! Come to shoot the breeze, or just to compare trophies of war? I have a great collection of skulls mounted above my flame-pit.#You sly dog, always great to hear from the [YourEmpireName]. What'dya wanna talk about?
Greetings, Ally. How might we work together today?

Greetings, [YourLeaderName]. While the Acrean and Drengin civilizations have had their past differences, we come to you with a proposition of brotherhood. The foul [OtherLeaderName] has relentlessly attacked us, spilling the blood of our people and threatening our very existence. We humbly request your aide in this losing war.#Hello, merciful leader of the [YourShortCivName] People. We come to you in the shadow of war, as the [OtherEmpireName] have threatened to destroy our great civilization. Shall we put our past differences aside and untie against these malicious beasts?

Greetings, [YourLeaderName]. While the Drengin and Acrean civilizations have had their past differences, we come to you with a proposition of brotherhood. The foul [OtherLeaderName] has relentlessly attacked us, bringing our civilization to the brink of ruin. We ask for your aide in this losing battle.# Hello, merciful leader of the Drengin People. We come to you in the shadow of war, as the [OtherEmpireName] has threatened our very existence. Shall we put our past differences aside and untie against this vicious warmonger?

Hello, friend. We are slowly being destroyed by the [OtherEmpireName]. Is there anything you can do to help us?#The war against the [OtherEmpireName] is going badly. My advisors have informed me that they do not expect us to be able to hold out much longer against [OtherLeaderName]'s forces. Is there anything you can do to help us?#The [YourShortCivName] have always been friends to our people. The [OtherEmpireName] is gradually destroying our civilization. We plead for any help that you can provide.#The [OtherEmpireName] have grown strong and slowly grinding our civilization to dust. Can you help us?#[OtherEmpireName] is powerful and the war against them is not going well. Is there anything you can do to help?#Please help us! We beg of you. The [OtherEmpireName] are too strong for us.
It was Human kindness that let you travel through the stars... now it is Human resolution that will wipe your kind from them. Prepare for death.

Then you will die, [YourLeaderName].#Very well. Goodbye, [YourLeaderName]. May your death be as painful as possible.#Do you hear that, [YourLeaderName]? It is the sound of your death. It is the sound of your agony. It is the sound of inevitability.

I must confess, we Humans have focused too long with warring with only each other. Apparently you are interested in being included now?#Go to hell.#Oh? Well here's a message for you: Kiss. My. Ass.#How do I put this diplomatically? Ah yes, cram it!#I'll see you in hell.#You obviously know little about Humans. We've been killing each other for thousands of years. Do you really think you can intimidate us?#Ha! There's something you should know about us Humans, we have a long history of war. Sadly, we're good at it. Very good at it.#I have skin flakes more impressive than you, [TheirLeaderName].#Explain to me the part where you apparently think we're supposed to be afraid.#We Humans have been killing each other for eons. If you'd like to join our party, go right ahead.

You [TheirShortCivName] are so pathetic... do you really think you can intimidate me?#Bite me, [TheirLeaderName].#Don't make me bite you, [TheirLeaderName].#Don't you have a crappy little empire to go run, [TheirEmpireName]?#Don't waste my time with your dribble.#You're too bold for your own skin... perhaps I can remove it for you.#We [YourShortCivName] don't appreciate being told what to do by YOUR kind.#You're lucky there's a billion light years between us... you'd be torn in half if you tried to intimidate me in person.
I don't think this is something we can do right now.#This isn't something that is in our best interests.#Sorry, can't help you presently.#Appologies, friend, but we just can't help you at this time.

Fail.#I don't think so.#No, I don't think we will be doing that.#(laughs) You don't seem to recognize your position.#That doesn't seem like a very good deal to us.#And this is a good deal HOW?#Tap, tap. Is this Universal Translator on? We must have missed the punch line. Why would we agree to this?#I think not.#This deal is unacceptable.#I would never agree to this.#You been drinking again?#I think not.#This is a joke, correct?#Wouldn't be prudent.#Let me put it like this, not on your life.#Not gonna happen.#Your offer is inadequate.
Great!
Excellent. I am glad we could come to an agreement.#This is satisfactory.#This agreement will do nicely.#It is done.#Excellent.

You... you want US to have a gift... from YOU?! I... don't know what to say... perhaps change really is possible. I mean, this hardly wipes away thousands of years of oppression... but it goes a long way to mending the bridge between us.

We had been slaves so long that we forgot how nice it was to receive something besides a laser-whip to the backside. Thank you much, oh generous [YourLeaderName]... may our races continue to grow closer.

Thank you for your generous gift. I must confess that you Humans know how to show the proper respect. We look forward to improved relations in the future.#Ah, [YourLeaderName], first your gift of hyperdrive, and now this?! I have to say I'm taken aback by your generosity. Let us look forward to a bright future between our people.
You're awfully nice... and I was under the impression you were just pain awful. Here's to a brighter future between the [TheirEmpireName] and the [YourEmpireName].
For being mechanical, you sure have a knack for generosity! May both our races look forward to a prosperous future together.
[YourLeaderName], your giving nature knows no bounds. If all leaders were as generous of you the galaxy would be a much more inhabitable place. Our future relations with your people are looking up.

Thank you for your generous gift. I must confess that you [YourShortCivName] know how to show the proper respect. We look forward to improved relations in the future.#Your generosity has not gone unnoticed, [YourLeaderName]. Our officials are very impressed in your resolve to keep the bonds of friendship tight between the [YourEmpireName] and our [TheirEmpireName]. May our future relations be as strong as your skills as a diplomat

What is this? A gift? It's not actually a disguised bomb, is it? Triggered to go off when I open it? Wow, I never expected such butt-kissing from the [YourEmpireName]... but who cares, I got stuff for free! This makes me like you little more, [YourLeaderName].#You come to bring me presents? Is it my birthday? Or the anniversary of my first kill in combat? This is a very slick bit of brown-nosing, [YourLeaderName], but I can't say it won't go unnoticed.

I must admit, [YourLeaderName], you have been much too kind to us recently. My high scholars in the field of inter-species relationships have suggested such excellent Diplomacy skills should be rewarded, so I have officially raised our relations with your civilization. May our understanding and appreciation of one another's culture continue to grow.
You have been very kind to us lately, [YourLeaderName]. Your excellent skills in diplomacy have convinced our leaders to improve our relations with your civilization.

You sure know how to kiss-butt... no, not literally you weirdo. Due to your excellent skills in Diplomacy, I'm officially improving our relations with your civilization... so don't let anyone say you get nowhere brown-nosing.

Hold on there, big, green, and charming. I think you've already given us enough gifts.#For a supposedly evil race, you just don't know when to stop giving, do you?#I can't say it's not appreciated, but don't you have civilizations to destroy or something?#If we Humans were as generous as you are, we'd have a lot less stuff.#I don't mind all the gifts, but I hope you don't expect further relation improvements from all this.#I figured you'd be more prone to taking, and here you go with all this giving.#I like the gifts... seriously... and we think you guys are great... but, don't you have someone else you'd rather talk to?#I hope you're not looking to trade these for a backrub or something.

Your new-found generosity is welcome, but you can't just sugar coat thousands of years of slavery with a bunch of gifts.#While they are appreciated, but it'll take more than gifts to win back the proper respect of the [TheirShortCivName] people.#The [TheirEmpireName] thanks you for your generosity. Hopefully these gifts show a true change in heart for your people, and aren't some quick-fix to mend poor relations.#[YourLeaderName]... I never would expect this overwhelming generosity from you.

The additional gifts are appreciated, but will not effect our relations.#These items will be put to good use.#We calculated an 88.791 to 1 ratio of further gifts from your nation. It appears our calculations were correct.#You'll find that our Artificial Intelligence stops caring about gifts after receiving several in a short period of time. I believe you've reached that point, [YourLeaderName].#Machines are much less prone to flattery as carbon-based organisms. Perhaps you should try, what is the phrase, 'Sucking-Up' to them instead?#Your continued giving is lost on our robotic intellect.#Our stockpile of gifts from the [YourEmpireName] is growing to a illogical size. Do you not have other matters to attend?#If you weren't carbon based I'd be very confused by all these gifts. You're not trying to charm me romantically, are you [YourLeaderName]?

Ah, more kindness from [YourLeaderName]. Always so giving.#Ah [YourLeaderName], I certainly didn't expect to see you here... again... giving us more gifts... like you did last week.#You're much to giving... perhaps you should share your wealth with a race that may need it more.#I can't say it's a surprise, but thanks for the gift.
Ah, more presents! Thanks!#Man, you just don't stop with the giving!#The free gifts just keep coming, don't they!#You need to keep some of this for yourself, [YourLeaderName]. I mean seriously...

Your gifts are appreciated but, honestly, enough is enough.#You're pretty desperate for approval, aren't you [YourLeaderName].#OK big spender, I'm not one to turn away free stuff, but you have better things to do with your time?#You're a lonely fella, ain't ya [YourLeaderName]?#Your really don't need to give me any more gifts... wait, what am I saying, I'm an evil race! Give me that free stuff!
Ah, a well timed bribe to halt our forces. Unfortunately the war will go on.
Thanks for the gift, but the war will continue.
That's very generous, [YourLeaderName], but you can save your possessions... they'll all be mine soon anyways.
We thank you for this generous gift.#Your generosity is greatly appreciated, [YourEmpireName].

Your military is crushed and your economy can't sustain the effort. Your propaganda to your people becomes more desperate, I can only assume you are here to grovel?#You are defeated. Beg now while you still have a tongue to beg with.#Your life, as it has been, is over. From this point forward, you will service us. Are you prepared to bargain for that future now?

Have our weak Human cousins come here to beg for our mercy? Our mercy may be obtainable for a price. A very high price...#Have you come here to confess the awful truth, that ultimately all Humans are nothing more than cheese-eating surrender monkeys?#We have studied your culture. I think the phrase to use now would be to say, we are most definitely 'kicking your ass'.

Bone-flecked jam. That is the future I see for the Human race if you are not able to grovel your way to peace today.#When we get done with you, you'll wish you had stayed up in the trees of East Africa where you belonged. Grovel now and we might let you live. Maybe.

The end of the [YourEmpireName] appears at hand. If it makes you feel better, we have found that your kind can be converted to a paste-like substance that makes an excellent lubricant. If you fail, Humanity will live on, sort of.#Our research units are preparing their organ harvesting factories for converting your people to nutrients for our use. They will need to be compensated if you wish to avoid that future.#Sentient organic life forms generate a great deal of energy. We have great plans to grow your kind in vast farms to harvest their energy like a battery. There may be other alternatives if you are willing to pay the right price. But, I doubt it.

Our people are looking forward to being the slave masters for once.#Your people are pitiful warriors, [YourLeaderName]. Maybe you are better at begging. Let's see how well you do at that.#Pride. It is something that has caused even the best of us to fail. And you are nowhere near 'the best'. Don't let your pride get in the way of your begging today.

Your head will look most excellent on a pike in my den. It will go well with my collection. But I am gentle being and am willing to delay that ultimate future if you are willing to pay a high enough price today.
From out vantage point, the war is not going too well for your kind. Are you here to attempt to negotiate 'peace in our time'?

Ah, so it's our pitiful cousins, the Humans. Soon, there will be no longer be evidence of your existence.#The war is going well... for us. What do you want?#If you are here to grovel, this would be a good time, we may take mercy on you since you are our cousins in some distant way.
You hear that? It is the sound of your death. Do you really think you can defy what is inevitable?#Did you really think your kind had any chance?
The time of your enslavement draws near.
It would seem your destruction is at hand. Are you here to grovel for mercy?#BOOM. BOOM. BOOM. You hear that? It is the sound of your death knock, knock, knocking on your chamber door.
You are defeated. It is useless to resist. Don't make us destroy you utterly.#Why do you resist... your destruction is the only stable constant in your future, so it should be comforting.

You are at the losing end of this war, [YourLeaderName]. Do not fight what can not be overcome.#I wish you would stop squirming... it makes it harder to bite your head off - figuratively, of course. It's a metaphor for our battling nations. Pretty clever, eh? I just came up with that.#We could crush you quickly, but you continue to put up a fight. Just stop and let your demise come with honor.#Your inability to face an inevitable defeat doesn't come as a surprise. Perhaps you should consider negotiating your way out of this war?#You're the leader of a semi-powerful galactic empire. The lives of billions lie in your decision to continue a failing war... perhaps you'll consider begging for mercy.

So it would seem we miscalculated when we thought to... persuade your civilization to become one with us. What would you like to discuss?#It appears that this war was a bit of a mistake on our part.#Hah! We were just kidding when we attacked you. Ha ha! See funny right? We really love you guys. Seriously.#Well this isn't going so well. What can we do to make peace?
You have attacked us and while our military is weak, our ancient civilization has survived much greater challenges.
So you have ruthlessly attacked your peace-loving galactic cousins. I'll not lie to you, you will probably win but we are a brave people. We are prepared to fight to the end if need be.
You have attacked us and appear to be winning. So, what do you want from us?
Sigh. We are always the victims. Enslaved, beaten, crushed. Do you take pride in being so ruthless?
Are you interested in ending this war? Do so only if you want true peace and not merely to just attack us again in a few years.

We may not be winning the war, but our people will continue to fight as long as you continue to oppress.#Don't gloat over victory quite yet... the [TheirEmpireName] is far from giving up, even if the outcome looks bleak.#We will continue to fight your evil as long as we can.
You foolishly attacked us, [YourLeaderName]. Now you come crawling here for peace I assume?

It would seem you made a mistake when you ruthlessly attacked us. Now you are here to see if you can persuade us to forgive you?#You attack and now you're losing. Pathetic.#Oh, let me guess, now you want peace?#I may be open to letting you grovel for peace -- though it's going to cost you a body part or two.

So, our Human cousins have come to once again ask for peace so that they can rearm, build up and attack again, take a few of our worlds maybe, and then repeat the cycle?#Oh wait, let me guess. You want to make peace. Then you will move your ships into our sectors, build up around our worlds, and then attack us. Once we've weakened you a bit, you'll come back here and ask for peace again? That sound about right?#You Humans are not much like us after all. When we make peace, we mean it. Usually anyway. You, on the other hand, use peace only to let your forces regroup so that you can continue attacks on us.

We are losing this war. But, make no mistake, we hate your civilization. Your pitiful 'strategy' of attacking us, making peace and then attacking us again disgusts us.#While we are losing, we are willing to fight against you to the bitter end. Your repeated attacks on us after having made peace show your true colors.#Perhaps we are being destroyed. But we have honor, unlike you. We don't make peace only to reload our weapons and attack again.#Ah [YourLeaderName]. So you want to make peace with us after having attacked us. Peace will cost you a great deal more though. Every novice strategist knows the trick of making peace to regroup and then attack again.

Carbon-based life forms. They always underestimate the intelligence of artificial life. Will we make peace with you? The price will be very high since you are using predictable strategy #1138 in which opponent merely makes peace to rebuild to attack again and then repeat.#Your limited intelligence has brought you to this state. The groveling you will need to provide to us will be great since we have identified your simple strategy of making peace, attacking, making peace, attacking and so forth.#Let me spell this out, fleshling. We have little interest in peace at this point. We are not interested in having our empire picked off a planet or two at a time and then having you come back to make peace with us.

Ah yes, the [YourEmpireName] think their pathetic 'strategy' of attacking, taking one of our planets, bribing us with peace, and then building up to attack us again will work? No, you will pay a high price for your lack of vision.#You thought you would just come and make a deal eh? That we would just make peace with you after you have repeatedly attacked us. Ah, the novice strategist thinks we'll just make peace while you organize for another attack and wear us down. Perhaps you should choose a different profession.#Ho ho, [YourEmpireName]. So pathetic. So predictable. Sure, you want us to make peace right? So you can build up and attack us again right? Is that your idea of a winning 'strategy'? Ha!

You smug little flesh-creature. You think this war's already won? You have yet to feel the full fury of the [TheirEmpireName].#The Drengin forces may look weaker than yours on paper, but the war is still young, and their passion for war has only started to burn.#We Drengin have been waging war across the galaxy before the Human race even began to crawl. Your war may seem to be going well now, but the tide will soon turn and it's is you that will beg for mercy.
The war has just begun, yet you are already coming to make peace?
Peace already?
The war has just begun... what could you possibly want from us?
What, have your 'Give Peace a Chance' protesters have prevailed?
We are not terribly interested in war, but we do not trust your sudden desire for diplomacy.

How ironic that the race that invented hyperdrive is so quick to use it as a weapon. We expected more restraint from you, [YourLeaderName].#The war just started, [YourLeaderName]. Why would you grace my terminal with your war-hungry presence?#To what do I owe the 'honor', [YourLeaderName]. Come to gloat at an early victory?#The war has just begun, [YourLeaderName]. The [TheirEmpireName] may not have the most powerful army, but don't think we'll be a pushover.#Come to give us another technological advancement and then use it to wage war on innocent civilizations?

The war has just started... why the sudden reliance on negotiations?#As far as I can tell you're more interested in fighting than talking.#Ah, the opposition comes to talk. Shake with one hand and ready a dagger in the other, eh, [YourLeaderName]?
The Human race may be new to space-travel, but war is sort-of our specialty. And we're confident this war will not end well for you. I can practically taste victory.

The war is fresh and glorious. We are confident of your extermination. You'll be hard pressed to convince us to end it so quickly.#We are winning. You are losing. We, on the other hand, are just getting started...
The war has only begun. And you are probably doomed. We are interested in territory -- your territory.
You want peace already? If I were you, I would want that too, but we're more interested in trying out some new military hardware.
It doesn't take much to make you flinch does it?
Humanity is doomed to extinction. The war has only begun as far as we're concerned.
Our calculations indicate a favorable outcome in our war against the [YourEmpireName]. You've come to pre-emptively request mercy, perhaps?

The war may be fresh, but your defeat is inevitable. You come to request peace?#How does it feel to be at the losing end of such a young war? It'll take some clever diplomacy to convince us to withdrawal when victory seems so obvious.#So early in the war and you've already come begging for peace? I should have expected this from you, [YourLeaderName].#You're as timid as your forces, [YourLeaderName]. The war has barely begun and you're already sweating.

We don't really like to admit when we're wrong... but MAN did we screw up when we decided to attack you guys. I mean, you're kicking our butts all over the galaxy. So what do you say, [YourLeaderName], what'll it take to put this war behind us?

The Drengin are a war hungry bunch. I know this, and I think it's safe to say you know this. Sometimes, due to warrior instincts fused into our DNA at birth, we act without thinking. Attacking you was one of those times. So how about we end this war, your people can live in peace, and I can take some anger management classes?
You Humans are more powerful than we had expected. Our fleet is shattered. What do we need to do to bring about peace?

Human, this is an awkward moment for us. Remember how we ACCIDENTALLY attacked you awhile back? That is just how our species shows its love of other civilizations. Now that we're kind of, well, dying, we were wondering if you would have mercy on us?

So, how's it going? When my advisors suggested that we attack you, they were kind of expecting that we would crush your civilization. Funny thing is, it turns out that well, crushing is going on but it's you crushing us. So, we were kind of wondering if you would be willing to make peace now?
You carbon-based life forms resist being assimilated far more than we had calculated. We have concluded that we cannot assimilate you by force. Logically, we now wish to end hostilities.

Well you see... it's like this: When we attacked you we were kind of, you know... hoping you'd die. But it seems you're now wiping the galactic floor with us so we were wondering if we could grovel for terms of peace?#Hi. Well, this whole war thing is going a bit differently than planned. You know, the plan where we attack you and you die? Not happening quite like that. Can we do a re-do?#You know, I realize that our mass attack on your people COULD be misinterpreted as hostility, but we really are interested in peace.#My bad. We really didn't mean to attack you. That's just how we show we love ya', baby. Let's call this off.#We're not doing so well with this war thing. Let's end it.
You aliens sure can be vicious. You've thoroughly beaten us into submission... let's talk peace before I'm too dead to talk at all.
Don't you think you've made your point? Your military has devastated our space navy and our economy is in desperate shape. What are your terms to make peace?
Surely you don't want to see us destroyed? We are, somehow, related to you by our obvious similarities. Could you please stop destroying us now?
We bow to your superior military power. You have demonstrated your strength. What can we do to bring an end to this war?
Our economy is shattered, our empire is coming apart. What have we done to you to deserve this? We only wish peace and friendship with you. Please spare our civilization.
You have demonstrated to us quite clearly the superiority of your organic based species in warfare. Let us conclude a peace treaty.
We're beat, OK? You've won. Now what will it take for you to withdrawal your forces? We'll do anything.
While we loathe you, your friends, the [OtherEmpireName], have been pressuring us to make peace with you. What do we need to do to come to terms?

Tired... I'm SO tired. Too much war for one lifetime. Please, let's stop wasting each other's time with some never-ending feud and move on with our lives.#I don't want to be the bigger man here, but this is just getting silly. We need to end this war, it's sapping too much of our time and, frankly, I have difficulties remembering why we're fighting in the first place. Let's lay down our weapons and come to a truce.
This war has been going on for a long while. While I am not fond of you, our people are weary of war. Let us come to terms.
[YourLeaderName]: Our people are weary of this war. What can we do to return to peace?
We're not terribly fond of you, but we have bigger things to rise to and have no more time to deal with your pesky interference.
This war is draining our civilization. While we despise the [YourEmpireName], we also believe it's time to come to terms. Let us end this destructive conflict.
This war is draining precious resources from other vital interests of our empire. We wish to discuss terms to end the war.
We're not going to be good friends any time soon, but the time has come to end this war.
We really hate war. We're a peaceful people and this war is costing too much in blood and treasure. Let us come to terms.
Let's end this war now and come to terms. We have a larger plan that does not concern you.

We are not fond of you Humans, you interfere with our plans. But right now, our plans do not involve you. Let us come to terms.#You monkeylings are costing us too much blood and treasure. Let us end this destructive conflict.#Listen Earth creature, other matters have come to our attention and our petty struggle with you is a distraction. Let us end the war.#It is true, Human, that in the end only bloody and death will decide the fate for our peoples. But, that end is not now. Your interference is distracting us from our other projects. Let us end this.#When we first came into contact with your kind, we dismissed you as weak and inconsequential. Since then, your rapid expansion has caused us a great deal of grief. This war between us distracts us from our larger goals. In the long term, you cannot stand against us so will not be so generous in treating with you indefinitely. Let us come to terms now and we can divide the galaxy between us.
Great deeds are happening at this moment elsewhere on the galactic plane that require our attention. Let us end this feeble conflict.

It is true we have no love for your kind, but bigger issues are at hand in the galaxy that we must deal with. We are open to a negotiated peace.#We are now open to a negotiated peace. Other concerns have come up that deserve our attention... concerns greater than our petty feud.#This war is costing us too much and you are not worth the effort. Let us come to terms.#This war is interrupting our larger plan for the galaxy, let us come to terms.
You have chosen poorly, Human.#So the monkey boy has some back bone. Interesting.
You will suffer for your imprudence.#You won't live to regret this.#So be it. You will be sorry.#You are braver than you look.
