Very disappointing.#We had expected more cooperation from our so-called friends.#Your unilateralism is threatening our friendship.
We appreciate it.#Thank you, [YourLeaderName].#We are grateful for your gift.

You have made a wise decision.#You have chosen wisely. You will continue to live... on your knees.#Thank you for donating to our galactic conquest fund.#You may continue to live... for now.#Good work you cheese-eating surrender monkey!#You have chosen to live.

We'd love to make peace with them. Unfortunately, they are not willing to do so. Talk to them.#Don't look at me... it's that power hungry [OtherLeaderName] that keeps this war going. Talk to the oppressor, not the victim.

Greetings, [YourLeaderName]. Since last scanned, your outpost [StarbaseName] in sector coordinates [StarbaseX], [StarbaseY] has continued to build up it's offensive capabilities. \n With a 86.8236 to 1 possibility ratio that this is a hostile action, we demand that you hand over the indicated outpost immediately. The price for refusal is termination of your species.

I am going to be candid with you, [YourLeaderName]. Your starbase, [StarbaseName], located in sector [StarbaseX], [StarbaseY] is too provocative to stay. It isn't mining a resource. It is building up its offensive weaponry. This is unacceptable to us. Give us the starbase or you will die.#[YourLeaderName]: We are monitoring the construction of [StarbaseName] in sector [StarbaseX], [StarbaseY]. You seem to be behaving as if you are playing some sort of poorly designed strategy simulator. Let us be clear: We are sentient beings who are well aware of the primitive tactic of building up an offensive capability and then attacking. You will hand this starbase over to us. Or, we will destroy you utterly.#Let me be succinct, [YourLeaderName]. We know about the build up of your starbases to an offensive capability for your fleets. For instance, [StarbaseName] in [StarbaseX], [StarbaseY], is near our star system. It is not mining a resource. It is clearly there to build up for an attack.

Let me be frank, [YourLeaderName]. [StarbaseName] in coordinates [StarbaseX], [StarbaseY], is offensive to us. We recognize cultural conquest when we see it. You will hand over this starbase immediately or we will destroy you.#[YourLeaderName], you obviously believe us to be naive. We recognize that [StarbaseName] in sector [StarbaseX], [StarbaseY] exists to try to sway our citizens against us. It will not work. Why? Because you are about to hand over that starbase now or you will be my personal slaveling.#[YourLeaderName], make no mistake, [StarbaseName] located at [StarbaseX], [StarbaseY] is unacceptable. It is a very obvious attempt to try to encourage defections. Since we assume you do not want war, you will hand this starbase over to us. Right. Now.

Greetings, friend. We are a little nervous about [StarbaseName] being built in [StarbaseX], [StarbaseY]. We trust you are building this there to help ensure our mutual protection. But, my military advisors are getting a little nervous.#Hello, friend of the [TheirEmpireName]. Our state department has asked me to pass on our concern over the building of [StarbaseName] in sector [StarbaseX], [StarbaseY]. It is gaining a considerable offensive capability.#Greetings as always, friend. I've been asked to pass on to you our nervousness over the increasingly powerful [StarbaseName] being constructed in sector [StarbaseX], [StarbaseY]. While we value our friendship with the [YourEmpireName], we are going to maintain a close eye on this starbase.

We are concerned about the starbase you are building in sector [StarbaseX], [StarbaseY]. It is not mining any resource, but instead seems to be gaining a significant offensive capability. We ask that you cease this. Disbanding it would be a good first step.#The starbase known as [StarbaseName], located in sector [StarbaseX], [StarbaseY], is acquiring a significant offensive capability. We ask that you cease this construction immediately.#When I was younger, I used to play strategy entertainment consoles. In these, 'games', as you call them, I would first build up my forces around the unsuspecting computerized players. Then I would attack. The computerized players were unaware of this. Human, we are not computerized players. We are a proud and ancient sentient civilization. [StarbaseName], in sector [StarbaseX], [StarbaseY], is a threat to us. We ask that you disband this starbase immediately.
No need to be concerned.#We have galactic defense obligations to meet.#When you're as powerful as we are, you can't be too careful.
You can whine all you want, but there's not much you can do about it.#If we wanted to destroy you, you'd know it.#So what are you going to do? Cry? Go ahead, squirt out a few.
Well too bad.#Tough.#We're big. We're tough. Whatcha going to do about it?
Oh, those little old things? They're for a... ummm... movie we're making.#We just like to build up our starbases. It's a bit of a hobby.#Gotta keep those defense contractors busy you know.

You can trust us, [TheirLeaderName]. The starbase in question is for defensive purposes only... we can both understand the threat of less civilized nations.#We're just building it for defensive purposes, [TheirEmpireName]. There is no reason for the [TheirEmpireName] to be worried about [StarbaseName].#It's nothing to be worried about, [TheirLeaderName]. We have nothing to gain from threatening the [TheirEmpireName] with some vole-infested old starbase!
Understood.#I will inform my advisors.#Thank you for this useful information.#I appreciate being kept in the loop.#Many thanks, [TheirLeaderName]. Please let us know if you learn anything further.
Just let us know if you ever remember what you came to say.#Perhaps your transmission was lost. Try sending that again.
What? Nothing came through. Try sending again.#Try filling your message queue before pressing the send button.

Nothing came through. Thanks for wasting my valuable time.#Next time how about sending something, moron.#I know the big and shiny SEND button is very tempting to press, but try not to until you've actually ENTERED a message.#You're not the brightest bulb, are you [YourLeaderName]? Try sending a message next time.#You didn't send anything. Idiots like you are why I prefer to wipe out civilizations opposed to talk things through.#Don't say you want to talk and just send over empty messages. You may have time to waste, but I do not.
Oh, sorry about that.
Oops.
I'm [YourLeaderName] - I'll press the Send button whenever I want.
We don't take kindly to threats, [YourLeaderName].

Does the [YourEmpireName] think of us as their own private bank that they can simply come to constantly to get a withdrawal?#Did you not recently come to us asking for tribute? We do not wish to fight you but we will not bankrupt ourselves to serve you.#It would not be in our best interests to continually supply the [YourShortCivName] war machine with revenue. Even though we've given you gifts in the past, it is not something we wish to continually do.

Though we admire your military might, our people will not give in to your extortion!#Our civilization was thriving while you were still hunting and gathering. You may be stronger than us now in some ways, but you are not nearly powerful enough for us to give in to your demands.#I think not, [YourLeaderName]. While some say that your power is destined to rule the galaxy, we will resist aiding you in that quest while we are able.

This must be some sort of joke. Your military power is not sufficient to carry out any sort of threats as far as we're concerned.#I don't think so.#We laugh at your threats. We have no use for you or your pitiful demands.

So it has come to this. The Humans gave the galaxy Hyperdrive technology as a gesture of peace but now that you have tasted power you demand tribute. Very well. We shall give you tribute, but beware Human, the price may be high in the long-run.
Your military is in no position to carry out threats. While we admire your potential military power, it is just that, potential.
If it is what you demand.#We are in no position to question you, [YourLeaderName]... so we will do as requested.
It appears we have no alternative but to do as you... request.#Fine. We didn't want those things anyway!#Very well. But we will not forget your threats.

Using your power to blackmail us is something we can truly appreciate. However, your time to die will come, [YourLeaderName].#I should have seen this coming, you slimy dog. Your demands will be met this time, but the next time you threaten [TheirLeaderName], you'll be met with death.
I would expect nothing less than threats from the vile [YourLeaderName].#We will do as you demand. But know this, one day the good civilizations of the galaxy will stand up to you.
Your vile threats may have worked today, but those races that live in your evil shadow will eventually take the [YourEmpireName] down.
Using your power to blackmail us is something we can appreciate. However, your time to die will come. Remember those words. I wouldn't bother putting anymore money away for retirement, either.
So is this the type of behavior one can expect to see from the so-called honorable [YourEmpireName]?
I would expect this out of the others, but I thought you were one of the good guys! You can have as you've demanded, but I expected better of you, [YourLeaderName].

Wow, looks like you've been studying our race closely, eh [YourLeaderName]. I couldn't have done it better myself: using your might to force demands down my throat... genius! Don't get me wrong, you will eventually die, a slow painful death, by my hand, but for now enjoy your spoils of victory, you clever weasel.#The chameleon shows his true colors. For a peace loving race you sure know how to threaten the weak, [YourLeaderName]. You can have as you've demanded, but rest assured that I'll be back to reclaim them... at the expense of your life.
Friend, our peace keeping efforts throughout the galaxy are expensive. We need you to help contribute to this by transferring [CashValue] bc from your treasury to ours.
Your civilization is too poor to pay us enough to allow you to continue to exist. Therefore we ask that you hand over some of your technology. In exchange, we will let you live.
Since we must be related anyway, we are sure you won't mind handing over one of your planets to your betters. We'll take good care of it.

Your civilization is utterly worthless. We will allow you to take up valuable space in our galaxy if you hand over one of your planets.#Your civilization is pathetic... no cash to give, no techs to offer. We will allow your empire to continue its feeble existence if you hand over one of your planets. Pray that I don't have any more relatives who need a vacation home.

[YourLeaderName]: While many of our people want to conquer you and harvest your species for its organs (especially its delicious skin) I am a kinder, gentler being and would be satisfied with merely [CashValue] bc.#We are debating whether it is best to enslave your kind or exterminate you. If you would like to delay our final decision, provide us with [CashValue] bc now.#Let's be clear: give us stuff or you will die.

[CashValue] bc. That's how many billions of credits I will need from you to convince our military to not exterminate your civilization. And I'll be needing that today. In cash.#We don't see much use for your civilization other than as a revenue source. Give us [CashValue] bc if you wish to continue existing.

We have heard you Humans have a saying. That it is better to die on your feet than live on your knees. If you wish to live you will do so on your knees and start by paying us [CashValue] bc in tribute.#We have laid claim over some of the territory you now occupy. Therefore we require some rent to continue utilizing the planets you're on. Hand over [CashValue] bc if you wish to live.

Your pathetic race has no business being out here in space. The fact that your kind created the Hyperdrive technology was clearly a fluke. You will pay us tribute of [CashValue] bc if you wish to continue to live.

Your civilization is proof that biological life forms are inferior. Still, we believe you do generate some level of GDP and hence can afford to pay us [CashValue] bc in order to fund our expansion.#Fleshling, we have no use for carbon-based life forms such as you. Transfer [CashValue] bc of your treasury to us or face the consequences.

Your civilization makes us laugh. If you would like to continue to exist, transmit [CashValue] bc to us immediately.#Pay us [CashValue] bc in tribute now if you wish to live as an independent empire.#Your military power is inadequate to defend yourselves in this hostile galaxy. We suggest you provide us with [CashValue] bc so that we can protect you -- from us.

We are both evil. We understand that. But the [OtherEmpireName] ... well they are not evil. And that's a problem for us. They are a threat to our torture-loving ways. We must act together to ensure that the galaxy is filled with misery and pain as it should be.#We both seem to believe that evil shall ultimately triumph in the galaxy. As it should be. We must work together to crush opposition which means that the [OtherEmpireName] must be destroyed eventually. For now, we must act covertly but let us work towards that eventuality.

The [OtherEmpireName] are covering the galaxy in a reign of sickness and darkness. The time to formally join together is not at hand. But, we must work together covertly to oppose them. Make no mistake, they will crush us separately if we do not resist.#A new darkness is slowly covering the galaxy. I give that darkness a name: the [OtherEmpireName]. We must work together in secret to ensure the survival of our civilizations.

Have you been keeping an eye on the [OtherEmpireName]? Their power is growing. We must begin to formulate a plan to stop them.#We are concerned by the growing dominance of the [OtherEmpireName]. If things do not change, we fear that they will come to dominate the galaxy.#The [OtherEmpireName] threat is growing. I suggest we quietly supply arms and money to any who are actively at war with them. Hopefully we can help loosen their grip on the considerable number of galactic resources they control.#The influence of the [OtherEmpireName] is growing very strong. They build starbases that intentionally magnify their cultural influence. If you do not wish to become an appendage of their empire, I suggest you work with us to resist their domination.

We love you. I mean, we really love you. Please have some stuff.#We admire your power and wish to offer you this gift in recognition of your greatness and peaceful nature!#Your benevolence has won the admiration of our people and we would like to present you with this token of our good will towards your wonderful culture.

We need '[YourTechnology]'... and you need '[TheirTechnology]'. It only makes sense for us to trade these two techs for the good of our nations.#You remember Hyperdrive? How we were nice enough to just GIVE that to you? Well, we have another technological BREAKTHROUGH we think you might be interested in, but this time we were hoping for a more 'equal' trade: '[YourTechnology]' for '[TheirTechnology]'.#'[YourTechnology]' for '[TheirTechnology]'... you know it's a good deal, [YourLeaderName]! Just click Accept and we can both reap the benefits of our new technology.

We are not proud to admit it, but our scientists have yet to make a breakthrough in a field you seem to have excelled in. Would you be open to trading '[YourTechnology]' for '[TheirTechnology]'?#The [TheirShortCivName] have always been better warriors than scientists, [YourLeaderName]. Your kind seem to have researched a technology that we have failed to explore. What do you say... your '[YourTechnology]' for our [TheirTechnology]?

You have advanced in a field that we have not yet been able to pursue. Would you share your knowledge of '[YourTechnology]' for ours of '[TheirTechnology]'?#There is research that you've done in a field called '[YourTechnology]'. We are willing to share our knowledge of '[TheirTechnology]' for this technology.

I have other offers on the table, but I just wanted to see if you wanted it first, [YourLeaderName]. To your most worthy race, the [TheirEmpireName] is willing to trade their knowledge of [TheirTechnology] for yours of [YourTechnology]. And please respond quickly... like I said, I have other buyers are waiting.#Greetings, [YourLeaderName]! I'm here to let you know that the ground-breaking '[TheirTechnology]' can be yours today! All I would need is a small trade to make this technology yours... perhaps your '[YourTechnology]'?
Greetingssss! I wasss hoping to exchange technologies with you today, [YourLeaderName]. How doesss a trade of '[YourTechnology]' for '[TheirTechnology]' ssssound to you?

How ironic that the beings that we created have gone to develop technologiessss that even our own scientists have yet to uncover. We are here to offer your knowledge of [YourTechnology] for ours of [TheirTechnology].

We, the [TheirEmpireName], have decided to grace you with a grand opportunity. We are offering our ground-breaking [TheirTechnology], and all we ask is your practically worthless [YourTechnology]. It's a hard deal to refuse, we know.#The gracious [TheirEmpireName] wishes to extend an agreement with you regarding some technologies. If you would agree to it, we would like to exchange our [TheirTechnology] for your [YourTechnology]. Is this acceptable?

Hello, [YourLeaderName]. We are interested in trading technology with you: your '[YourTechnology]' for our '[TheirTechnology]'. Is this deal acceptable?#Greetings. We have some interest in your technology. Would a trade of '[YourTechnology]' for '[TheirTechnology]' be acceptable?
We are always willing to help out our friends.
I guess we don't have much choice in the matter. We have done as you asked.#Okay, here you go. Please don't hurt us.

We'll do what you ask, just don't hurt us.#Very well, we will do as you want.#It is done. You will find that we are excellent collaborators.#Okay, no need to be rude.#We'll do what you want.#As you wish.
You may have gotten what you want this time, but we will feast on your entrails one day.#We'll give you what you demand but one day, we'll shove that tribute right down your throat.

It pains me to see you so helpless when they're faced with mortality. Alas, even with all our help I fear your empire would be doomed. I'm sorry, old friend.#We will try and get help out to your forces, but I fear your cause may be lost. The [OtherEmpireName] is just too powerful... I'm sorry.

Don't take this badly, but your cause is lost.#Helping you would be a waste of resources, I'm afraid. You should let your people be aware that the end is near. I'll see if there's anything we can do to delay the inevitable.#How can I put this delicately? You're probably doomed.

Why would we help you? Your empire is S C R E W E D!#And jump on the sinking ship known as the [TheirEmpireName]?! Doubtful.#Stop your whining and face death with honor... and while your at it, how about you give us some free stuff to remember you by... I'd hate to see it all go to the [OtherEmpireName].
We will do our best to muster up the forces to help you, my friend.# I will seek council on the matter and try my best to get help to you as soon as possible. Hang in there, my friend.
Let me see if there's anything we can do to help you.#I will consult with my advisors as to whether we can help.#If we can help, we will.
We're fighting our own wars, thank you very much. But, if we can spare a fighter or two, perhaps we'll send it your way.
Thanks for the information.#Believe me, we know this.#We're doing our part.#We are monitoring the situation.
I believe it... I haven't trusted [OtherLeaderName] since the day we crossed paths.#I KNEW that [OtherLeaderName] was up to no good!
Thanks, [YourLeaderName], but we are close friends with the [OtherEmpireName] and trust them entirely. Perhaps your informer was mistaken?
Perhaps, but [OtherLeaderName] is also our friend.#We have good relations with them, but we'll take your message under advisement.#They are our friends, but we will heed your warning.
Grrr... those slimy, two-faced rats! I knew something was up with [OtherLeaderName]. We'll be on the lookout for more of their foul ways.

We have significant debt. Taking on more is not an option.#Woah, woah, woah! Hold on there, big trader. We can't possible make that deal... our debt is already a problem... this offer would cripple us!
I'm afraid our military just isn't strong enough to wage an effective war against [OtherLeaderName]'s forces. I apologize for the miscommunication on the matter.
Their military power is just too strong. Forget it.
You think I'm crazy?! Not even I'm blood-thirsty enough to pick a fight with the [OtherEmpireName].
Sorry, I've been advised to keep ships in orbit in those areas due to an increase in foreign Transport activity. Once the transports are out of range, I'll be open to trading those vessels.
Uh, no, we're not going to trade ships with you when you have so many Transports full of troops near us.
Oh, [YourLeaderName], you clever dog. Trying to pull my ships out of orbit so you can bring in your Transports for an easy kill? I don't think so, my friend.
Prepare to die, Human. We declare war.
This war is ON and you must die.

Well fleshling, you know what we think of you? We think you Humans are good. In fact, we think you're delicious. For that reason, we are going to conquer you now. Prepare for your doom. And we have studied your evil behavior throughout the galaxy. Did you really think you could simply replace the rightful rulers of the galaxy - us - with your own brand of cruelty?#We've been studying Earth for some time, as you know. You Humans have thwarted us time and time again and now, here at this time, we shall put our might up against yours.#Earth will suffer greatly for your interference. And any mercy we shall have on you, which shall be little, owes only to the fact that it was, somehow, you Humans that first discovered Hyperdrive technology. Through hyperdrive, we now have the means to bring our death furnaces to you to wipe your pathetic species.#In the end, any colonies of Humans will be exterminated. But we will keep Earth special. The Humans there shall be slavelings to do as we command.

The Drengi are a filthy, evil, race that must be wiped out. Now, the tables are turned, Drengin scum. Now we shall do to you as you once did to us. Long ago the Ur-Quan Hierarchy occupied our world. That was in the time before Hyperdrive. Now, with Hyperdrive, we can send reinforcements to ensure that we grind your civilization into dust!

The Drengi are a filthy, evil, race that must be wiped out. Now, the tables are turned, Drengin scum. Now we shall do to you as you once did to us. Long ago the Ur-Quan Hierarchy occupied our world. That was in the time before Hyperdrive. Now, with Hyperdrive, we can send reinforcements to ensure that we grind your civilization into dust!

The Drengi are a filthy, evil, race that must be wiped out. Now, the tables are turned, Drengin scum. Now we shall do to you as you once did to us. Long ago the Ur-Quan Hierarchy occupied our world. That was in the time before Hyperdrive. Now, with Hyperdrive, we can send reinforcements to ensure that we grind your civilization into dust!

Well Human, your vile behavior across the galaxy has given us no choice but to purge you from existence. Your evil will be ended once and for all.#We have studied your planet well, Earth creature. And your history explains much as to why you are such brutal and sadistic creatures.#Prepare to be destroyed.

It is time for your people to become one with us. This, sadly, will cut your time short on your petty evil but we will integrate you into our society as best we can. You, however, will not survive.#Humans have proven time and time again how evil you really are through your actions. Now we will visit upon you the kind of pain you have visited upon others.

Well monkey boy, we can appreciate your tendency to do cruel and horrible things to other creatures. We do the same thing to fleshlings everywhere. But, now it is your turn to suffer a similar fate. No hard feelings?#When we get to your home planet, we will have plenty of time to look through your continents to see what the best way to exterminate your people without damaging the planet too much.#But, one thing will be certain: when we are done with you, the galaxy will be free of creatures of your kind.

Your civilization is simply too evil to be allowed to continue. Prepare to die.#We consider it our mission to help rid the galaxy of evil. Your civilization fits that description nicely and therefore your planets will be rid of your presence soon enough... prepare to die.

Nothing personal, but the time has come to remove you from the galaxy. But to be honest, I doubt few will be sorry to see your evil civilization go away.#For the good of all living things, we have decided your empire must be destroyed.
The time for war has come. Prepare for your doom. We have learned much from your evil ways and plan to use them -- on you.

We have given the galaxy the gift of Hyperdrive technology, but feel you have abused the great powers the technology allows, so now we give a second gift... your race's swift and absolute termination.
Prepare to die, Humans.
Prepare to die, Humans.

You have interfered with our plans for the last time, Human. Enough of these games, we shall crush you and your civilization.#The fact you guys built Las Vegas alone justifies your extermination. The fact you keep getting in our way demonstrates you need to die.#Diet soda? Do you really think a species that could invent that could be allowed to live? Prepare for your doom.#In the end, any colonies of Humans will be exterminated. But we will keep Earth special. The Humans there shall be slavelings to do as we command.#All your base are belong to us.#You Humans will soon be our slavelings. Prepare to die.#Time to die, Human!#It is time. We always knew that this would end in war. Now we shall destroy you.#I've got a song for you, Human. It goes like this: 'This land is my land and now so is your land'. Prepare to die.

It's sad that your people have come this far, but unfortunately they still haven't been able to properly adjust to being a major player in the galaxy. The strong will rise to the top, while the weak stumble and die. We're just speeding along the process... we'd hate for the [YourEmpireName] to suffer through an existence of mediocracy. Prepare for your extermination.

Your people will soon be under our rule once again, [YourLeaderName]. Face your doom.#OK, you've had your fun as a free nation. Now it is time for us to round all the Torians up for a second age of enslavement. We assume you won't come peacefully, so prepare for the full fury of the Drengin Army.#You filthy Torian scum... you thought you could get away from our iron grasp, but now the mighty Drengin Army is at your doorstep. Prepare to once again become our slavelings.
Our Death Furnaces don't power themselves you know. We've calculated that it'll be easier to fuel them with your carcasses than to mine the ore necessary to power them.

You Humans are so like us. And your military is so weak that it is inevitable that you will be conquered by someone. Therefore, we reason, it is better to be conquered by us than by someone else. Please do not resist as we will try to make your... eh... liberation as painless as possible.
Prepare to be destroyed.#We have much in common with you. And soon, your planets will be something we have in common. Prepare to become part of our Empire.
You Humans disgust us. You are copies of us that we can no longer tolerate.
Prepare for your destruction, Human.

Ever since we first came in contact with you around 100 of your years ago, we have had to decide whether we should conquer you or work with you. We have decided that the balance of power in the galaxy has shifted and that the time to conquer you has come.
Now we can put an end to you Humans once and for all.

We are a proud and powerful civilization. As such, we need subject worlds to worship us. Given your pitiful lack of military power, we have decided to educate you in matters of warfare from the losers' perspective. Prepare to die.

The tables are turned, Drengin scum. Now we shall do to you as you once did to us. Long ago the Ur-Quan Hierarchy occupied our world. That was in the time before Hyperdrive. Now, with Hyperdrive, we can send reinforcements to ensure that we grind your civilization into dust!

The tables are turned, Drengin scum. Now we shall do to you as you once did to us. Long ago the Ur-Quan Hierarchy occupied our world. That was in the time before Hyperdrive. Now, with Hyperdrive, we can send reinforcements to ensure that we grind your civilization into dust!

The tables are turned, Drengin scum. Now we shall do to you as you once did to us. Long ago the Ur-Quan Hierarchy occupied our world. That was in the time before Hyperdrive. Now, with Hyperdrive, we can send reinforcements to ensure that we grind your civilization into dust!
Long ago we were enslaved by the Ur-Quan Hierarchy. In time, we were able to fight them off. This means when we conquer you, we know how to keep you from ever being free again.

The time of purification has arrived. We, who were once slaves of the Ur-Quan Hierarchy, can now cleanse the galaxy under our rule.#Our civilization was once enslaved but we broke free! This may seem like words of inspiration but what we actually mean by that is that we know how to prevent you from ever being free again. Do not resist, it will only make things harder for you.
Our dealings with the Ur-Quan Hierarchy have taught us much. One thing that it has taught us is that we cannot stand other sentient beings. So... you must be exterminated.
Our civilization detests carbon-based life forms such as your own. Therefore we will conquer your species and then exterminate you all. Nothing personal. End of line.

Okay Human, here's the thing, your so-called "amusement parks" are really fun. In fact, they're so fun that we want them for our own. So, well, how do I put this delicately, we are going to have us as permanent guests very soon. Prepare for war.#I regret to inform you that we have decided to annex your territory. Sound the horns or milk the goats or whatever it is you people do, but prepare for war.

So Human, we meet again for the first time for the last time. But before you die, there is something you must know. I am your father's, brother's cousin's former roommate. Which means you are about to become nothing at all...#I will avoid using pointless cliches to explain this so I will be brief: prepare to die!#Our people need more room in this galaxy and that room happens to be occupied by you. Consider this your eviction notice.

We've heard Human flesh tastes excellent. We are about to find out. Prepare to die!#The time of your extermination is at hand. But fear not, we shall keep a few specimens of Human on hand in our zoos for our amusement.#Time to die, Earther!#So long, farewell, death is knocking at your door. And we won't be stopped by your puny fleet. The Human race is about to go extinct.#We shall crush your civilization and enslave your pathetic people, Human.#Resistance is futile, Earther. It is the end of the world as you know it. And, I feel fine about that...#I am here to inform you that you are dead. You may not feel dead but soon, you will wish you were. Once we conquer all the Human worlds, we will put you to work.#Earth is doomed and so are you. All of Earth's major cities shall be wiped out except for the city of Plymouth, Michigan which we shall use as a sanctuary to display what's left of the Human race.

We are ever so sorry to have to do this but the territory you currently... well... exist on is actually needed by our people. We will try to make this as painless as possible but, in the end, your civilization must come to an end. Prepare for your end.#We need new land to build overpriced, sub-standard vacation homes with a view of a lake. Your land will do nicely.#It is time to bring our enlightened ideals to your people. Surrender now if you know what's best for you.#Your territory shall become ours.

The time for war has arrived. Prepare to be destroyed.#Our disgust of the [YourEmpireName] can be contained no more... you and your kind will die.#War is only acceptable if used as a last resort between nations, but in your case, we'll make an exception. Prepare for death.#The [YourEmpireName] is a stain on the fabric of a strong galaxy... prepare to be eradicated.#We're sorry to inform you, but we have decided we need more breathing room. Prepare to die.

We shall soon see who is the stronger -- you or us. We shall grind your civilization into the dust. We declare war!#We're hungry and you are coming to dinner -- as the main course. Prepare for death.#Time to die.#The galaxy is too small for the two of us.
Carbon-based life forms spend too much time worrying about material items. We deny this request.
My apologies, but we are unable to give you those items at the moment. Perhaps some other time.
I'm sorry. We can't help you today.
I have my own concerns at the moment, [YourLeaderName]. I don't have time to be giving handouts.

We request, oh generous [YourLeaderName], the donation of certain supplies to our humble nation:#Greetings, fellow space traveler. We request the following items from your little empire... if you have them, of course!:#In our effort to bring peace to the galaxy, we must ask you to donate selflessly to our cause.

Greetings. Could the [TheirEmpireName] give some supplies to help us through a tough time?:#I know we all need supplies, but I'd really be appreciated if you could give us a hand and donate the following:
It pains me to admit it, but we need some supplies. Could you help an evil brother out?

Sorry, friend, but my advisors just doesn't feel comfortable handing weapon technology over to you when the [YourShortCivName] military is already so powerful.Honestly, if it was up to me you could have them... we're pals, I know you're trustworthy... but I have to run an honest government here, and my comrades feel strongly about declining the offer. I'm sorry.

This is a fine offer, but my military advisors insist that handing over such powerful Weapons technology to the already powerful [YourEmpireName] is not in the best interest of the [TheirShortCivName] people.My apologies, [YourLeaderName], but we can't accept the trade as long as those technologies are included.

As much as I like that offer, my overbearing advisors keep insisting that trading Weapon technologies over to the [YourEmpireName] wouldn't be prudent.I don't think it matters... I know how the warriors' instinct works, and you [YourLeaderName] do NOT have a warriors' instinct, but unfortunately I have to say no.

Just because we are a peaceful race does not make us naive. You are building up a dangerous army, [YourLeaderName], and we will not willingly make this trade with you requesting such powerful Weapon technologies. The mere suggestion insults our intelligence.

I can't believe you, [YourLeaderName]. Asking for technologies to build up your already staggering army, when, for all I know, you could be planning an all-out assault my people? No, no, no, [YourLeaderName]. You can take your 'offer' and shove it... we're through here.
Ha! Trying the old 'Bait and Switch' on me, eh? You come to trade for Weapons technologies, then use those same technologies to wage war against my empire?!

My apologies, but as much as you may need these items, I don't think it'd be in the [TheirShortCivName] peoples' best interest to hand over such powerful Weapons technology to the already overwhelming [YourShortCivName] army. May our friendship continue, despite my inability to do as you've requested.

Sorry, [YourLeaderName], but my military advisors have put up the big 'red flag' when it comes to handing over that Weapon technology to the most powerful military in the galaxy. No offense, friend, but we just can't give you those items.

Ha! Your request is a bold one, [YourLeaderName], but I have a hard time justifying just GIVING those Weapons technologies to most powerful army around. You should enjoy being on top, and as flattered as I am by your envy, I have to decline this request.

We will not willingly hand over technologies that will strengthen the already repulsive [TheirShortCivName] army. Even if it brings down your wrath, handing over those technologies is too dangerous for us to agree to.

You arrogant twit... how dare you try and blackmail us for weapons that you'll probably just use to wage war on the [TheirEmpireName]? Your army may be strong, but one day you will be put in your place.

It's just not enough for you to have the most powerful fleet around, eh [YourLeaderName]? But now, you have the nerve to demand more Weapons technology for your growing military machine?! May your blind greed and arrogance lead you to a slow, painful death.
Your request has been approved.#We will assist you by donating the requested items.#We will comply with your request.

We can help you this time, friend.#Certainly, friend. The items you've requested will be provided.#How can I turn my back on my pal [YourLeaderName]!#Of course... just let us know if there's anything else you need!#Sure, and if we need something down the road perhaps you can return the favor?#Anything to help our friends in the [YourEmpireName].
No problem... just don't make a habit of it asking for handouts.#Of course the [TheirEmpireName] will help out if you're that strapped for supplies.

Nobody likes a beggar, [YourLeaderName]. But since you're our friends, my advisors say we should help you out. Your request for supplies has been approved.#Here you go, [YourLeaderName]... but just remember, you owe us!#Sure, we can help you out... and I'll just write up a little IOU to remind me that you owe us big, [YourLeaderName].#The [TheirEmpireName] never turns away from a chance to rack up debts from others. The requested items are yours, [YourLeaderName]. We'll talk later...

I'm sorry, but didn't we just give you supplies?#What did you do with the items we just gave you? That wasn't enough?#Our friendship should be based on more than me giving and you taking.#Perhaps you would gain more by returning the kindness we just showed you, instead of requesting more handouts? Speaking of which, are you ever planning to return my power-sander?

I just gave you a bunch of stuff... now you want more?#No, I'm sorry... No more handouts.#We will help out on occasion, but don't confuse our generosity for stupidity, 'friend'.#Seriously, we're not the 'First Galactic Bank of [YourLeaderName]'.#Please take your requests elsewhere.#'Me', 'Me', 'Me'. You're quite needy, aren't you, [YourLeaderName]?#Nobody likes a mooch, [YourLeaderName].

Your begging grows old, [YourLeaderName].#Sounds like someone needs to learn how to stand on their own two feet.#What about my needs? How about you give ME something? That sounds like more fun.#Your requests are making my blood start to boil, [YourLeaderName].#No, you can't have that.#Go away... I'm sick of your begging.#Get off your knees and act like a true leader. And NO, you can't have that stuff.#NO! Go away, man... it's getting old!#NO you can't have more of my stuff.

We consider ourselves a very generous people, but for us to trade for [UsefulTechName], along with it's preceding techs, would be quite silly. I mean, who needs any of the older technology when you'd have the latest, greatest version? I'm sorry, [YourLeaderName], but we can't agree to this deal.#So, I noticed you put in a bunch of older techs in the same path as the newer one. Why exactly would we need that junk when you're planning to trade [UsefulTechName]?

As tempting as your offer is, it just doesn't make sense for us to trade for [UsefulTechName] along with all its worthless preceding techs. Once we have that more powerful technology, the others are fairly useless; wouldn't you agree [YourLeaderName]?
I don't know what we would use all those other techs for when we'd already have [UsefulTechName]. That deal seems a bit shady, [YourLeaderName] and we KNOW a shady deal when we see it.

We're not fools, [YourLeaderName]. You try to fluff up the deal with the worthless prerequisites to the technology '[UsefulTechName]', then pass it off like you're going us a favor? We may be a kind people, but kindness does not equate to stupidity.
No. I'm sorry but trading for [UsefulTechName], along with it's prerequisite techs, would be VERY stupid on our part... and we're just not that stupid. Try a bit harder, [YourLeaderName].

Our fleets have no use for those other techs if we were to receive the more powerful [UsefulTechName] in the trade. Your offer disgusts me, [YourLeaderName]. I hope one day your cocky diplomacy tricks lead you to an early grave.

This is a fair trade.#The items on both side of the trade equal out.#Calculations indicate this is a good trade.#My items would be worth your items in this dealing, flesh creature.#[YourLeaderName], so far your request is a fair one.#We could agree to this barter.
I like what I see.#A fairly positive trade, it should seem.#I approve thus far.#So far, so good.#Looks acceptable.#Not bad.#Go on.#Very nice.#Keep going.#This I would go for.
That seems to be an acceptable proposal.#An interesting proposal, [YourLeaderName].

Not too shabby, [YourLeaderName]. I could go for that!#I've seen worse deals.#You're quite the shrewd negotiator, [YourLeaderName].#Can't say I wouldn't approve of this deal.#A decent trade.#The trade seems fair so far.#Very nice.#Keep it up.#I would accept this.#This looks good to me, [YourLeaderName].#This would be accepted by my government, [YourLeaderName].
Hmmm...

You have sent us to our doom. I hope you can survive when [OtherEmpireName] comes for you.#Very well, we shall remember this.#In time, they will come for you.#We are the only thing keeping them from going after you. You must know this.#I hope you can sleep at night.#May the gods curse you.#In time, the [OtherEmpireName] will consume you.#You're next... You know that, right?
We would be honored to accept your aid.#Thank you!

You are my hero, [YourLeaderName]!#We shall sing songs in your name.#You are our champion!#May all the hamsters of your world dance the dance of joy!#Thank you! I take back all the mean things I said about you.#Oh joy! I take back all the things I've said about your spouse.#May your body odor become a musk for the opposite sex of your kind.#I promise to send you a Kalvanian lizard eye for your birthday!#I love you man!#You are the wind beneath my wings!

The galaxy is not a friendly place at the moment and you are at war with our friend. Nothing personal, but I'm afraid we're going to have to... take care of you.#It's a shame you are at war with our friend... We have no choice but to side with them in their war against you.

We have nothing personal against you, but you are at war with a friend of ours. Which... is disruptive to our economy. I'm afraid you're going to have to be eliminated.#Your war with our friend is causing damage to our economy. Our people demand stability and we feel you are the obstacle to that stability. Therefore... we will have to wipe you out.

Your war with our friend may not be your fault. But, we don't really care because it is inconveniencing us. Therefore, you will have to die.#Your pathetic attempts to make war have only caused us to have to move in to destroy you. We aren't particularly fond of the friend you are at war with, but we are fond of their money.
Your gift is appreciated, but rejected.
We reject this gift.
Calculations indicate this gift is worthless. Offer rejected.

Your offer is kind, but I think we'll pass, [TheirLeaderName].#We appreciate the offer, [TheirLeaderName], but insist that you keep it for yourself.#We couldn't possible take this, [TheirLeaderName], but thank you.
Thanks, but no thanks [TheirLeaderName].#I think we will pass on that, [TheirLeaderName].#Sorry [TheirLeaderName], we really don't need that.

I think we can do without your 'gift', [TheirLeaderName].#Don't waste my time with such pathetic gifts, [TheirLeaderName].#No thanks, [TheirLeaderName]... I don't need your garbage.#I'll pass on your trash, [TheirLeaderName].
We accept your kind offer, [YourLeaderName].
Offer accepted.
Offer accepted. Perhaps we will rethink your doom.
Thank you for the kind gift, [TheirLeaderName]!#The [YourEmpireName] is lucky to have such generous friends as you, [TheirLeaderName].
Thanks for the gift, [TheirLeaderName].#We'll gladly take that, [TheirLeaderName].#The gift is appreciated, [TheirLeaderName].

We'll gladly take accept your offer, [TheirLeaderName]... but in all honestly, we'll probably end up re-gifting it.#You sure know how to brown-nose, [TheirLeaderName].#The people of the [TheirLeaderName] sure know how to suck-up.#Well be taking that, [TheirLeaderName].#Perhaps your gift will keep your people alive a bit longer.#[TheirLeaderName], a bribe like this is always welcome.#Come bearing gifts, [TheirLeaderName]? Oh, how I love a good bribe...
War will continue, fleshling.
Calculations indicate your forces are too weak to win this war, so I reject your peace treaty.
I don't feel this peace treaty is the best option for my people. Destroying you, unfortunately, is the only way to bring true peace to the [TheirEmpireName].
No, I think the war will continue.#Peace will only come when you are destroyed.

As much a we enjoy your pathetic begging, the war will not stop, and your empire will fall.#Why would we end a war when victory is in our grasp? No, [TheirLeaderName], your empire is doomed.#Don't you know that my troops only get more bloodthirsty when the prey shows weakness? Our forces will press forward, [TheirLeaderName].
Let us lay down our arms, [TheirLeaderName]. A brighter future awaits.
Yes, let us put this war behind us.
As much as we feel victory is in our grasp... we shall agree to this peace treaty.
We are no longer capable of surviving as an independent power in the galaxy. We have decided to put our fate in your hands and surrender.
We realize now that we cannot possibly remain alive as an independent power. We have decided to surrender our forces to you.
The atrocities we have committed will be paid back upon us ten-fold. Our only chance for survival is to surrender to you and hope that you can protect our people from retribution.
We have decided to surrender to the [SurrenderedTo]. We hope that they will have mercy and compassion for our people.
Our war is lost. Before we are completely obliterated, we have decided that we shall surrender our remaining worlds to the [SurrenderedTo]. Our fate is in their hands.

The galaxy apparently doesn't want our particular brand of... enlightenment. Our military is crushed. Our economy is in ruins. We have decided that now is the time to surrender while we still can. The [SurrenderedTo] have made the best offer. Our worlds are now under their control.
You think you have won? You think you have beaten us? We shall deny you your final victory. We have decided to surrender to the [SurrenderedTo]. They will protect us from your wrath.
We curse you. While we know we cannot defeat you, we shall have the last laugh. We have surrendered to the [SurrenderedTo]!

You may have the upper hand. But, we shall deny you the spoils of war. The [SurrenderedTo] have offered to take our surrender and we have granted it. We shall meet again -- in hell!#You think you have beaten me? You think you have won! We shall thwart you yet, for we have decided to turn our worlds over to the [SurrenderedTo].#We hate you. You have ruined us. Our plans. Our dreams of conquest. But we shall escape you yet. We have chosen to give our worlds to the [SurrenderedTo]. We shall meet again!
You Humans have proven that you are powerful. We surrender.
We are weary of this war and know it is un-winnable. We surrender.

We should have exterminated you Humans when we had the chance. You monkeylings have proven yourselves in battles this time. We surrender.#You Humans are a fraud. You claim to be the great diplomats and merchants of the galaxy. What a lie. Within your velvet glove is an iron fist. You Humans know warcraft far, far too well to be mere diplomats. War and fire come naturally to you. In the end, that fire and death that you bring to us today will be returned to you a 100 fold. We surrender.#You have utterly crushed us this time, Human. We surrender.#Your power is impressive. You Humans are not what you first appear to be. Behind your diplomatic facade you are cunning and brutal. We have no choice but to surrender.#You have utterly destroyed us. We have nothing left with which to fight you. We surrender.

So the [SurrenderedTo] isn't so full of diplomatic niceties after all. You have won the war. We surrender.#We have nothing left with which to fight with. We surrender.#Please have mercy on us, we never wanted anything but friendship with the [SurrenderedTo]. We surrender.#Nothing seems to be able to stop you. We have no choice but to surrender.

We are impressed with your power, Human. The galaxy may be yours eventually. For today, we hope you are satisfied with our worlds. We surrender.#You have defeated us. We offer you our surrender.#We cannot hope to defeat you so we surrender to you.#We offer our surrender to the powerful [SurrenderedTo]. You win.

Ah, the mask of the Humans is finally revealed for what it is. You are not diplomats or merchants. You are conquerors. The [SurrenderedTo] has won on this day but eventually others will rise against you.#So the [SurrenderedTo] are not what we thought they were. At first we dismissed you as being weak. It is now clear that you are cunning warriors. We surrender.
You have defeated us. Our military is destroyed. Our population is in panic. You have won. We surrender.
The [SurrenderedTo] is too powerful for us. You have won. Please have mercy on us. We surrender.
We shall hate you forever, but you have won. You have utterly crushed our civilization. We bow to your power and strength and surrender ourselves to you.

Stop. Just stop. You're embarrassing both of us. Let me guess, you are going to line up your invasion ships around our worlds and then, with a lightning strike, take out our defenses and then invade? Oh, you're a real strategic master. We are awed by your brilliance! You are lucky my generals are not set to "Intelligent" or higher or else I'd crush your ships like a bug. So please, have at it.#We can't help but notice that you've lined up some invasion ships around our planets. So let me guess, your previous military experience involves playing some sort of "video game" where you play only against computers and this tactic actually worked. You're not playing against some video game, we're sentient beings. Beings worthy of respect. However, you are fortunate in one way, my tactical generals intelligence is not "Intelligent" or better. So while I'm helpless to prevent what you are about to do, I wanted you to know that I know what you're about to do.

Stop. Just stop. You're embarrassing both of us. Let me guess, you are going to line up your invasion ships around our worlds and then, with a lightning strike, take out our defenses and then invade? Oh, you're a real strategic master. We are awed by your brilliance! You are lucky my generals are not set to "Intelligent" or higher or else I'd crush your ships like a bug. So please, have at it.#We can't help but notice that you've lined up some invasion ships around our planets. So let me guess, your previous military experience involves playing some sort of "video game" where you play only against computers and this tactic actually worked. You're not playing against some video game, we're sentient beings. Beings worthy of respect. However, you are fortunate in one way, my tactical generals intelligence is not "Intelligent" or better. So while I'm helpless to prevent what you are about to do, I wanted you to know that I know what you're about to do.

Look. You're just embarrassing both of us with this tactic. Surrounding our planets with Transports in preparation to attack? What do you think this is? A video game? If you were trying this tactic against a fellow being of your own kind would they just sit there and let it go unnoticed? Please. Fortunately for you, my military generals have been set to be too dumb to actually do anything about it. But I'm not. I see what you're doing. And if my generals had their intelligence at "Intelligent" or better, they'd squash you.#I'm insulted. Truly insulted. Putting a bunch of Transports right next to my worlds in preparation for attack? Real subtle. It's people like you that do this kind of thing against simple video games against the computer players on your planet. Then you go and tell others how the computer players are no match for playing other sentient beings and that is why "multiplayer" is a needed "feature". You're lucky my generals are too foolish to do something about it.

We can't help but noticed you've surrounded our planets with various Transports. Let me guess, you plan to attack and invade. Very creative. Rather than allow you to do that, we have decided to take preemptive action.#We're a kind and peaceful civilization. However, even we can't help but notice that you appear to be about to invade our worlds. In the interests of peace, we declare war.

You apparently have us mistaken for some primitive computer-based game. We are sentient creatures and demand respect. Parking Transports around our world as you prepare to invade us is insulting to our intelligence. We are not going to wait for that invasion. We declare war.
You pathetic creatures and your foolish strategies. Did you really think I would be blind to such an obvious attempt to invade our worlds? We shall destroy you before you destroy us. Prepare to die.
We are a virtuous civilization that values peace and justice. That said, we couldn't help but notice your significant military build up on our border. Would you mind removing those ships?
We are not blind. We see the military build up. Remove your ships or we will do it for you.
You dare put your ships right on our border? Remove them or we will remove them for you.#We do not appreciate having such a large military presence right near our worlds. Remove your ships.

Don't waste your time with Influencer starbases. We synthetic organisms are basically immune to your so-called culture.#Fleshling, your Influence starbase, [StarbaseName], is close to our worlds. We do not care for this. It is futile, however. We have no interest in your culture.#[StarbaseName] is trying to peddle influence on our civilization. Look at me closely, [OTHER_RACE_LEADER]. Do you really see me wearing clothing? Or eating your food? Think carefully.

Our people are really enjoying the new songs and fashions of your civilization. However, we are concerned that there may be too much of a presence of them. [StarbaseName] over in sector [X],[Y] is pretty far from your home planets. Some even argue that you are deliberately trying to influence our citizens. If you continue to do this kind of thing, it could affect our relations.#[StarbaseName]. Your starbase over in [X], [Y] is having quite a party. Some of our citizens are starting to be influenced by it even though it's closer to our worlds than it is to yours. You wouldn't be trying to culturally influence our people now would you?#Greetings, [OTHER_RACE_LEADER]. How you doing? Hey, you know, that Influencer starbase over in sector [X], [Y]? Yea, that one. Hey, it's a little closer to us than we'd like. Now, we're not saying you need to move it, but my military is starting to be concerned by this sort of thing.

You know, my daughter came back from a party the other day. A party over at [StarbaseName]. I didn't recognize that name. So I asked her about it, turns out it was a starbase that belongs to the [YourEmpireName]. I.e. YOU. Now, believe me, you do NOT want to see one of our kind wearing the clothes designed for your species (shivers). So we ask you to not build any more near us. I'll keep bringing this up as long as that starbase is there by the way.#I was going over my daily report from sector [X], [Y] and you're not going to believe what I heard. Yea, there's an Influencer starbase right there. I know, I couldn't believe it either. Look, we like our culture. So please remove that base or at least don't build anymore or else, well, bad things will happen -- to you.

[OTHER_RACE_LEADER]. Your Influencer starbase annoys us. The one over in sector [X], [Y]. Don't play coy. [StarbaseName] is a direct offense against our civilization. It's too close to our civilization. I will keep pestering you on this issue (or kill you depending on our military situation of course).#The [EmpireName] will not tolerate Influencer starbases parked around our civilization. Beware. Keep your Influencer starbases away from us.

Greetings, [OTHER_RACE_LEADER]. How you doing? Hey, wanted to bring up [StarbaseName]. The one located in sector [X], [Y]. Yea, I know those sector numbers aren't very helpful but, here's the thing, it's a military starbase. And well, I know you would never dream to build up a military base in order to attack us. But well, it is awfully close to our territory and your planets are ever so far away. So, could you get rid of it for the sake of our friendship?#You know, that military starbase you've got going near our planet is upsetting our military. Just a head's up.#You wouldn't be preparing to attack us would you? I mean, not us. We're all nice and friendly and peace loving. [StarbaseName] is making my commanders nervous.#My military commanders think you're preparing to attack us. Say it isn't so!#We don't want war with you. Consider your next moves carefully...

[OTHER_RACE_LEADER]. Your military starbase, a.k.a. [StarbaseName] is too close to our territory. If you value your relations with us, you'll remove it.#There's an ugly rumor going around that you are planning to attack us soon. Why would that be?#Sector [X], [Y] is claimed by us. Don't forget that.#Your military starbase is making us nervous. The one called [StarbaseName] (real creative name by the way).

Look slaveling, or future slaveling, we don't appreciate your military starbase ([StarbaseName]) parked right near our territory. Stick them in your own area.#We're not fools, [OTHER_RACE_LEADER]. We know you're looking to attack us. You will regret underestimating us.#When you've been torturing and killing for as long as we have, you know what a surprise attack looks like. Spare us your novice build up strategy. Be careful where you put your forces, we're keeping an eye on you.#We don't care for your starbase layout, [OTHER_RACE_LEADER].#[OTHER_RACE_LEADER], let me be plain. Does the [YourEmpireName] want war with us? Because our sources tell us you are gearing up to attack.#The starbase called [StarbaseName] located in sector [X], [Y] is unacceptable to us. It constitutes an aggressive move on your part. Remove it or face the consequences.

Perhaps bioforms are stronger than synthetic forms of life. Our troops have been crushed and calculations indicate a slim chance of survival.Take our worlds... maybe you can make better us of them then we have.

War has taken it's toll on my empire, [PlayerName]. My troops have fought, and died, at the hands of our enemies. Now, I entrust our future to you. We surrender all our assets to the [SurrenderedTo].May they serve you well in this galactic struggle. Fare well, ally.

We've been defeated, [PlayerName]. Our forces fall as the enemy advances. We surrender all our worlds to you in hopes that, under your rule, they will survive this interstellar battle.Give 'em hell, [PlayerName]!#This war has broken my empire. Our economy is ruined, our forces are crushed, and the alliance between our nation and yours has withered. Luckily, your army is still strong enough to overcome the enemy. Take our worlds... use them to the best of your ability. May the glory of our nation live on through the powerful [SurrenderedTo].

We lack the strength to survive this galactic war. Our worlds have been entrusted to the honorable [SurrenderedTo], who have been our friends throughout this conflict.May they overcome the evil that has terrorized the galaxy for so long.
We have succumbed to the powerful grasp of war, and will surrender to our allies, the [SurrenderedTo]. All our worlds now belong to them.

We have little power left to fight with. Our army is crushed, our economy is broken, and our research falls further behind. Perhaps our allies, the mighty [SurrenderedTo], will have more success in battle than we have. We hand our worlds over to them.

On our planet, many years ago, a nation state called Germany nearly conquered the world because other nations stood by and watched them conquer weaker nations one by one. We recognize what you're doing and we won't stand by and allow this to happen on a galactic scale. We're coming for you.

On our planet, many years ago, a nation state called Germany nearly conquered the world because other nations stood by and watched them conquer weaker nations one by one. We recognize what you're doing and we won't stand by and allow this to happen on a galactic scale. We're coming for you.

On our planet, many years ago, a nation state called Germany nearly conquered the world because other nations stood by and watched them conquer weaker nations one by one. We recognize what you're doing and we won't stand by and allow this to happen on a galactic scale. We're coming for you.

Your reign of terror is at an end. We will not permit you to roll over the galaxy one by one. Your war of aggression against the [FRIENDCIV] was unprovoked. #Your war with the [FRIENDCIV] has no merit. We will not stand by and watch you conquer the galaxy one civilization at a time. We declare war.
Your war machine must be stopped. We declare war.#We will not tolerate your wars of aggression. We declare war.

As much as we admire your warlike ways, your war with our friends, [FRIENDCIV] has put us on notice that if we don't do something soon, we might be next.#Given your pattern of behavior, we realize that we might be next on the chopping block. So we've decided to go to war with you while we still can.
It has recently been made economically justifiable to go to war with you. Prepare to be destroyed.
We've been paid quite well to take care of you. So consider yourself taken care of. Prepare to die.
Certain..parties have provided us with funding to wipe you out. Prepare to be destroyed.

We value your friendship and we believe that the [YOURENEMY] is a threat to stability in the galaxy. Therefore, we have decided to join the war on your side.#The [YOURENEMY] threatens us all. We have decided to join the war on your side.
The [YOURENEMY] must be stopped. So we have decided to come to your aid in this war.
Greetings, [YOURPLAYERNAME]. We have decided it is in our best interests to capitalize on the foolishness of the [YOURENEMY]. Therefore, we have joined the war against them.

We wanted to inform you that we have decided to go to war against the [AGGRESSORNAME]. Their brutal and unprovoked attack against the [DEFENDERSNAME] had to be responded to. Let this be a warning to all civilizations who would needlessly go to war.#We felt that we should inform you that the [DEFENDERSNAME] have been ruthlessly attacked by the [AGGRESSORNAME]. To stop such warmongering, we have decided to put together a force to deal with the [AGGRESSORNAME]. Feel free to join in.

The [DEFENDERSNAME] are under attack by the [AGGRESSORNAME]. In the name of galactic stability, we have decided to come to the aid of the [DEFENDERSNAME]. We felt we should allow you to be aware of this in case you wanted to join in.#The [DEFENDERSNAME] are the victims of a war of aggression by the [AGGRESSORNAME]. We have decided to intervene in the name of peace.

The [AGGRESSORNAME] are our kind of scum. The [DEFENDERSNAME] are weak and ripe for destruction. However, it is not in our interest that we let them go around conquering our food, err I mean our neighbors. So we have decided to take this opportunity to remove the [AGGRESSORNAME] from the galaxy. Feel free to join in the fun.#As much as we approve of the weak being wiped out, the [AGGRESSORNAME] are becoming too much of a threat. Their war with the [DEFENDERSNAME] is the perfect opportunity to deal with them.#The [AGGRESSORNAME] are beating us to the punch at wiping out weak civilizations such as the [DEFENDERSNAME]. But we cannot afford them to take over the entire galaxy so we have gone to war. You should join us in this task.
We wanted to inform you that we have decided to go to war against the [AGGRESSORNAME]. A power with a great deal of persuassion has encouraged us to do so.
The [AGGRESSORNAME] are not fit to survive. A third party that shall remain anonymous has made it clear that it is our duty to wipe them out.
The [AGGRESSORNAME] need to be wiped out. At least, that's what we've been paid to think. Either way, they will soon be destroyed.
WAR is to be avoided at all costs, but now we have no choice#We have decided to punish the [TheirEmpireName] for its crimes against the universe. Prepare for WAR!

Today, I declare that all [TheirEmpireName] worlds are only a mere province of the [YourEmpireName]. The use of force will ensure your compliance.#Let's see how tough the [TheirEmpireName] really is. Prepare for WAR!

Prepare your escape pods, [TheirLeaderName]! The [YourEmpireName] is coming for you!#Your time has come, [TheirLeaderName]! Prepare for WAR!#Your existence is a plague unto us all! The [TheirEmpireName] will be utterly destroyed!#I am appointing myself sovereign leader over all [TheirEmpireName] worlds. Don't like it? Try and stop me!#Let the bloodshed begin!

Although we have appreciated the support of the [TheirEmpireName] as an ally, it is no longer necessary.#We thank the [TheirEmpireName] for its support as our ally, but it is time for an alliance to come to an end - peacefully.
The alliance between [YourEmpireName] and [TheirEmpireName] is hereby dissolved.#The mighty [YourEmpireName] no longer requires the assistance of the [TheirEmpireName].
We thank the [TheirEmpireName] for supporting us in the past, but we no longer need your support.#Well, this has been a swell alliance, but things are different now. Let's call it off.

We no longer desire to share our resources with the [TheirEmpireName]. Is that alright?#The deal we made with the [TheirEmpireName] in the past has outgrown its usefulness. We would like to cancel it.
We are no longer able to share with the [TheirEmpireName]. It's just too much for us.#We'd like to help you out, but we are no longer able to keep our agreement to share with the [TheirEmpireName].
Remember when we decided to share? We were just joking.#We will no longer share our resources with the [TheirEmpireName].
Very well, we understand, but are a little disappointed.#We're sorry to see you go.#Is it something I said?
You're abandoning us?#If that's what you want...#Consider this alliance - dissolved.#Our alliance is nullified, [YourLeaderName], but I'd be lying if I told you I wasn't a bit surprised.
You're turning your backs on us, eh?#That's a shame.#Oh yeah? Who needs you, anyways?#Fine! I'll go start my own alliance with someone else who won't just get up and leave!
This isn't making a good impression, [YourLeaderName].#You don't want to share with us anymore, eh? You're not making me very happy...
Now THAT wasn't very nice...#You can't do that! Well, I guess you just did, but still...

And you expect me to tolerate this?#Lesson 1 in Diplomacy 101: Do not take back something you share with someone else. Paying attention, [YourLeaderName]?#Aw... I was just getting used to this whole 'Sharing' thing.
Please don't take this the wrong way but we feel that it is too early for us to commit to any far reaching treaties at this time,
No. It's too early right now for us to get entangled in treaties.
You're kidding right? We have no idea whether your civilization is going to be worthy of our treaties. It's too early. Only if you prove your worth will we consider it.
We are always interested in trading. However, [Tech] is far too valuable for us to trade at this time. At least at any sort of reasonable price.
We must reject your offer. [Tech] is too important to our strategic goals to trade with someone else. We'd only trade it under the most favorable conditions.
Forget it. We worked very hard to get [Tech] and we have no intention to handing it over to anyone. You'd have to give...your right arm for it. For starters...
It is true that [Planet] isn't core to our civilization being far away from [Homeworld]. But it is still very valuable to us. You would need to compensate us.
[Planet] is not crucial to our culture. But it is still a highly valuable world from our point of view. If you want it, you will have to pay for it.
[Planet] is very far from [Homeworld]. So we might be willing to let you have it but only if you pay through the nose.
The planet [Planet] is crucial to our civilization's future. We are not willing to let it go.
[Planet] is central to our culture now. It may seem like a trifle to you and indeed, you probably think we are unreasonable for caring about it, but we do.
[Planet] is mine now. MINE. We shall do with it and its peoples as we please.

The unsteady foundations of peace have begun to falter, [YOURPLAYERNAME]. Reports from the [YOURENEMY] indicate [YOURENEMYLEADER] bares ill intentions towards the [YOURPLAYERCIV]. In keeping true the brotherhood between our nations, let my forces be the ones to strike down your opressive neighbor. Perhaps one day you can return the favor.

Our scouts have picked up on military activity in [YOURENEMY] territory. Intelligence indicates that [YOURENEMYLEADER] plans a sneak attack on your worlds in the upcoming months, which would give your army little time to prepare, [YOURPLAYERNAME]. As a token of our friendship, let my army strike before the [YOURENEMY] does. We will eradicate [YOURENEMYLEADER] and make the galaxy safer for both our nations.
The [YOURENEMY] agressions towards your nation have not gone overlooked, [YOURPLAYERNAME]. We will bare down on your opressor before [YOURENEMYLEADER] has a chance to strike.

We have taken pre-emtive action against the [AGGRESSORNAME], opressors of our friends in the [DEFENDERSNAME]. Bare agressions towards my friends and your worlds will suffer a similar fate, [YOURPLAYERNAME].
We are normally a peace loving civilization. However, your pathway to ascension is a threat to our way of life. It is a threat we plan to eliminate by destroying you.
While we do not have a general problem with your civilization, your control of so many ascension resources means that we have little choice but to destroy you before your civilization ascends.
You pathetic fool. Did you really think we would stand by and allow you to simply ascend to the mastery of the galaxy?

Greetings. We just wanted to inform you that we have just started researching [TECH]. Our technological advancements continue.#Our research program has continued to bring our civilization great triumphs. For instance, we have just begun researching [TECH].

Our mighty civilization is proud to announce that we have begun researching [TECH]. Tremble at our vast technology capability...#The technology you know of as [TECH] is will soon be understood by our civilization.#Hello there. We now have begun looking into [TECH]. Because of our long relationship, we are willing to give it to you. No, just kidding. We're not. Just teasing there. Yea, little bit cruel I know.#We will soon have [TECH]. Now, I'm not saying our civilization is more intelligent than your civilization. But on the other hand, I'm not saying we're not either.

Whohahah! We have just begun researching [TECH].#Grovel at our power and wisdom for we will soon have [TECH].#Now you know why evil will always triumph over good -- because good is dumb. Our civilization has just started researching [TECH].#Tremble in fear! Our offensively powerful and lethal civilization now has begun researching [TECH].#Cuddly creatures beware! For we will soon have [TECH].#Small furry animals walking on the roadside your doom is at hand for we are in the progress of obtaining [TECH].
